trans-unit.source: Who are the doctors on HealthTap? Are they all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing? How are they selected?
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上的医生是谁？他们都是信誉良好的美国拥有执业执照的医生吗？他们是如何被挑选的？

trans-unit.source: All doctors on HealthTap are licensed to practice medicine in the U.S. and are in good standing. They include doctors from leading U.S. medical institutions (like Stanford and Harvard), as well as private practices from across the country. HealthTap Medical Experts are independent third parties, and are not employed by or affiliated with HealthTap. Admission to the HealthTap network is by application and invitation only.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上所有的医生都持有用药证书并且有良好的信誉。他们包括美国顶级医学院（比如斯坦福和哈佛）的医生，也包括美国的私人医生。HealthTap的医学专家独立于第三方，他们并不受雇或附属于HealthTap。只有申请或受邀才能进入HealthTap网站。

trans-unit.source: Can I get a prescription, a medical diagnosis or medical treatment on HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 我能在HealthTap获得处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗吗？

trans-unit.source: No. Prescriptions, diagnosis and medical treatment are not available on HealthTap. Please see your doctor or medical care provider for these as you normally would. Even if your real-life doctor is on HealthTap, prescriptions, diagnosis and treatment should not take place on or over the HealthTap service. HealthTap is not intended or designed to replace your doctor's independent judgment about the appropriateness or risks of symptoms, conditions or treatments (including procedures) for any given person, including you.
trans-unit.target: 不可以。在HealthTap上不可获得处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗。请照常去见您的医生或医学医护服务提供者来获取这些。即使您真实世界的医生也在HealthTap上，处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗也不应该被包含在HealthTap的服务内。HealthTap并不旨在代替您的医生为任何人根据症状、病症或治疗（包括临床操作）等独立做出的合理判断，包括您。

trans-unit.source: Can I really submit a question to thousands of doctors for a free answer?
trans-unit.target: 我能向很多医生免费提交一个问题来获得回答吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes - it’s true!  Health questions submitted to HealthTap are submitted to our network of thousands of doctor across the U.S.  These doctors try to answer every question that’s submitted.  Questions are most likely to be answered when they have not already been asked and answered, and they are good health questions (easy to understand and useful to the entire HealthTap community). Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 是的 - 当然可以！HealthTap的问题将会上传到我们数以千计的医生网络中。这些医生会尝试回答每个被提交的问题。HealthTap的问题将会上传到我们数以千计的医生网络中。这些医生试着回答每个被提出的问题。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Why is question length limited? Can I ask a longer question?
trans-unit.target: 为什么问题的长度受限制？我能询问更长的问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Questions on HealthTap are limited to 150 characters to make them easy to view on mobile devices, and so that they can quickly be read and answered. Try re-phrasing or leaving out personal details to shorten questions. If you have a longer question to ask, you can make a 99 cent charitable donation and submit your question with 50 more characters, or you can ask a private question to a specific doctor on HealthTap (for a small fee).
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上的问题被限制在150个字符内以便它们可以在移动设备上被浏览，这样它们可以得到快速回答。试着重新组织语言或剔除个人信息来缩短问题。如果您有更长的问题需要询问，您可以付出99美分的价格来提交一个可拥有50个额外字符的问题，或者您也可以向HealthTap上的一名特定医生询问一个私人问题（需要很少的费用）

trans-unit.source: How fast will I get a response to my question?
trans-unit.target: 我多快才能获得我的问题的回答？

trans-unit.source: Almost every question submitted to HealthTap receives an answer – especially those that are well-written. Most questions are answered promptly, often within 24 hours (some questions are answered within a few hours, or even a few minutes). Well written questions useful to the HealthTap community have the best chance of being quickly answered. The response time for questions asked for free depends on the number of other unanswered questions. If you’d like your question to receive priority (and to increase the likelihood of a fast response), you can make a charitable donation at the time you ask it.
trans-unit.target: 几乎所有的HealthTap的问题都会获得回答——尤其是那些精心提出的。大多数问题都会快速地被回答，一般是24小时之内（一些问题只需要几个小时甚至几分钟）。对HealthTap社区有益的精心提出的问题最有可能被快速回答。免费提出的问题的回答时间基于其他未回答的问题的数目。如果您希望您的问题被优先回答（或者添加快速回答的概率），您可以在询问时进行慈善捐赠。

trans-unit.source: Where does my money go when I pay to send my question to doctors?
trans-unit.target: 当我就我的问题向医生付款时，我的钱去了哪里？

trans-unit.source: All profits from payments to improve question response time and increase question length are donated to one of the many medical charities supported by HealthTap, including: Operation Smile, Doctors without Borders, American Red Cross, Susan G. Komen for the Cure, Direct Relief International, African Medical & Research Foundation (AMREF), Against Malaria Foundation, Nurse Family Partnership, Naya Health, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative (SCI), MAP International, Global Partners for Development, and others.
trans-unit.target: 所有加快问题回答速度和添加问题长度的费用都捐给了HealthTap支持的众多医疗慈善会中的一个，包括：微笑行动，无国界医生，美国红十字会，苏珊•科门乳腺癌防治基金会，国际直接救济组织，非洲医学&研究基金会，疾基金会，护士家庭合作计划，纳亚健康，血吸虫病控制计划，MAP国际，全球发展伙伴和其他

trans-unit.source: How much do Private Conversations cost? How long will it take to get an answer to a private question, and what if it’s is not answered?
trans-unit.target: 私人咨询的价格是多少？私人咨询多久才能收到回答，如果没有被回答呢？

trans-unit.source: There is a small fee (less than the cost of a typical co-pay for someone with comprehensive health insurance) to ask a private question directly to the doctor of your choice on HealthTap. When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上您可以通过付出一笔很小的费用（低于有全面健康保险人的典型共同支付的费用）来直接向医生询问一个私人问题。当您在HealthTap上向医生提交一个私人问题的时，医生最多有72个小时来回答这个问题。如果在规定期限内您没有收到回答，您将会收到全额退款。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to ask a question privately to a specific doctor of my choice using HealthTap and how are private questions different from public ones?
trans-unit.target: 我能在HealthTap上根据我个人的选择向特定的医生询问问题吗？私人问题和公共问题的区别是什么？

trans-unit.source: To ask your question to a specific doctor on HealthTap, send a doctor a direct message and start a Private Conversation. These messages are private and HIPAA-secure, and let you upload files (like scans or reports). Public questions submitted on HealthTap are distributed to multiple doctors and are public – both the question and the answer are visible to anyone who becomes a member on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 为了在HealthTap向一个特定医生询问您的问题，向他发送直接消息并开始私人咨询。这些消息是私人并是HIPAA安全的，您可以自己下载资料（如扫描或报告）。在HealthTap上提交的公共问题是分发给众多医生并公开可见的——问题和回答都对所有HealthTap的会员可见。

trans-unit.source: How long will it take to get an answer to this private question? What if it’s not answered?
trans-unit.target: 私人问题多久才能获得回答？如果它没有被回答怎么办？

trans-unit.source: When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time.
trans-unit.target: 当您在HealthTap上向医生提交一个私人问题的时，医生最多有72个小时来回答这个问题。如果在规定期限内您没有收到回答，您将会收到全额退款。

trans-unit.source: Can I make appointment requests using HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 我能使用HealthTap进行预约请求吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes! HealthTap lets you request appointments with doctors on their Virtual Practice pages. Just hit the “Request Appointment” button and send the doctor your details. The doctor or his or her office should then contact you to schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.target: 可以！HealthTap使您可以在医生的在线诊疗网页上预约。点击“预约诊疗”按键并向医生发送您的详细信息。医生或他/她的办公室随后会联系您来确定预约时间。

trans-unit.source: What’s a DocScore and what does it mean?
trans-unit.target: 医者评分是什么，它意味着什么？

trans-unit.source: A DocScore is a number that reflects both publicly available information as well as a doctor’s reputation, experience, and engagement on HealthTap. The higher the number, the better. A high DocScore shows you (among other things) that the doctor is both active on HealthTap and that other doctors frequently agree with the answers that he or she provides on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 医者评分是反应医生公开可获取的信息以及在HealthTap上的声誉、经验以及参与度的综合数字。数字越高越好。较高的医者评分告诉您医生不仅在HealthTap上保持活跃，而且经常获得其他医生对他在HealthTap上发表的回答的认同。

trans-unit.source: What is my Health Activity, what it is used for, and how do I edit it?
trans-unit.target: 我的健康活动是什么，它被用来做什么，我怎么编辑它？

trans-unit.source: Your Health Activity is a record of the health and related information you enter into and share with HealthTap. It is completely secure and private. Your Health Activity is used to provide you with better information on HealthTap. Your Health Activity is never visible to other members on HealthTap, but if you choose to start a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap using our new House Call feature, your real name and your Health Activity will be visible to that doctor. You can edit your Health Profile and add to your Health Activity at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您的健康活动是您在HealthTap上输入并分享的您的健康及相关信息的记录。它完全是安全的和私密的。您的健康活动用于为您提供有关HealthTap的更好信息。 HealthTap上的其他会员永远不会显示您的健康活动，但如果您选择使用我们的新的出诊功能与HealthTap上的医生开始私人健康咨询，您的真实姓名和您的健康活动将向该医生显示。 您可以随时编辑您的健康档案并添加到您的健康活动。

trans-unit.source: To log in to HealthTap you must first register and create an account. When you do this, you’ll pick an email address and password to use. You can change your log in information in your settings at any time. If you’ve already registered and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 要登录HealthTap您必须先注册并创建一个账户。当您在做这些的时候，您需要选择一个邮箱地址和密码。您可以随时在设置中修改您的登录信息。如果您已经注册，但是无法登录，请联系我们。

trans-unit.source: How can I follow up with a doctor, or ask for a second opinion?
trans-unit.target: 我如何跟进一名医生并询问第二意见？

trans-unit.source: If you’ve asked a public question and want to follow up with the doctor who answered it, you can start a private conversation with that doctor. Similarly, if you’ve received a doctor’s opinion, you can start a private conversation on HealthTap to receive a second opinion. Private conversations allow you to upload and share documents and your health activity with the doctor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提出了一个公开问题并想跟进那位回答了您问题的医生，您可以和那名医生开始私人咨询。同样的，如果您获得了一名医生的建议，您可以和他进行私人咨询来获得第二意见。私人咨询允许您与那名医生上传并分享您的档案和健康活动。

trans-unit.source: To add other group affiliations to your HealthTap profile, edit your Virtual Practice page. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 如果要在您的HealthTap档案中加入其它群组联系，请在您的在线诊疗页面编辑它。了解更多 »
提供有帮助的回答：回答更多

trans-unit.source: Accepting new private messages from patients
trans-unit.target: 接受来自患者的新私人消息

trans-unit.source: Fill out the "about" section of your Virtual Practice page with all of your background information and highlights of your practice and expertise. Make sure to include important office location and hours information.
trans-unit.target: 在您的在线诊疗页面的“关于”栏目中填写所有您的背景信息和突出您的诊疗与专业技能。确保包括了重要的办公室位置和时间信息。

trans-unit.source: What are the benefits of joining the Medical Expert Network and how do I join?
trans-unit.target: 加入医学专家网络的优势是什么？如何加入？

trans-unit.source: The benefits of HealthTap for doctors are spelled out on our doctors page. If you are a U.S.-licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed physician in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap对医生的优势在我们的医生页面。如果您是拥有美国执业执照的医生，您可以在线注册或下载一个适用于iPhone，iPad和安卓的HealthTap MD应用程序.注册便捷且容易——只需不到一分钟即可开始。在注册过程中，我们会询问并证实所有的HealthTap的医学专家都是具有良好信誉的美国拥有执业执照的医生。如果您在注册过程中需要帮助，请在这里寻求我们的支持团队的帮助。

trans-unit.source: How do I join the Medical Expert Network?
trans-unit.target: 我如何加入医学专家网络？

trans-unit.source: If you are a U.S. licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed doctor in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here
trans-unit.target: 如果您是拥有美国执业执照的医生注册一个在线或下载 HealthTap Md应用程序为 iPhone, iPad和安卓。注册便捷且容易——只需不到一分钟即可开始。在注册过程中，我们会询问并证实所有的HealthTap的医学专家都是具有良好信誉的美国拥有执业执照的医生。如果您在注册过程中需要帮助，请在这里寻求我们的支持团队的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Everyone claiming to be a U.S. licensed doctor that wants to join the Medical Expert Network is verified through a manual review process. This process ensures that all of the doctors on HealthTap have met the necessary requirements to legally practice medicine in the United States. After successful verification, a notification is sent out to confirm membership in the network. Verification typically takes between 24 and 48 hours.
trans-unit.target: 所有声称是美国拥有执业执照的医生并想加入医学专家网络的人都会经过的人工验证过程。这个过程确保了所有HealthTap上的医生都在美国拥有合法的诊疗医学。在验证成功之后，您会在网络中收到确认会员信息的通知。验证通常需要24到48个小时。

trans-unit.source: Can Medical Groups register on HealthTap?
What is file sharing and how does it work?
trans-unit.target: 什么是文件分享以及如何操作？

trans-unit.source: Patients and doctors are now able to send digital files on HealthTap through a HIPAA-secure process. Documents and images may be uploaded and sent worry-free to assist in the transfer of information and care. Files that you are sharing and that have been shared with you are accessible in your library, which can be reached by clicking the button in the left-side menu.
trans-unit.target: 患者和医生现在能够通过HIPAA安全处理在HealthTap上传送电子文件。文件和图像能够上传并且无忧无虑的传送，来帮助传递信息和医护您分享的文件以及分享给您的文件都可在您的图书馆里看到，只需点击左边菜单按钮即可。

trans-unit.source: Can I get reimbursed for my participation?
Can I choose whether or not to respond to a private message? What is expected if I reply?
trans-unit.target: 我可以选择是否回复一条私人信息吗？如果我回复的话，期望我回复什么？

trans-unit.source: You have the power to decide if you will respond to a private message. When you do respond to a private message you will have access to the patient’s Health Activity and any shared files associated with the message. Responding consists of answering the question posed by the patient in a 600-character answer field. You are encouraged to use photos if they will help support the information you are providing. When you are satisfied with the information. If you elect not to respond to a particular private message you may do so by selecting the “Can’t Help” button. When you do so, you have the option of referring the patient’s message to a colleague in your network. If a private message is unattended for 72 hours, your Responsiveness score will decrease, although the message is still available to view and respond to beyond 72 hours.
trans-unit.target: 您有权决定是否回复私人信息当您回复私人信息的时候，您可以使用患者的健康活动以及任何与该信息相关的已分享的文件。回复需要回答患者提出的问题，字数为600字以内。我们期望您使用能够帮助补充您提供的信息的照片当您满意该信息时。如果您选择不回复个别私人信息，您需要选择“无法帮助”按钮。当您这么做的时候，您可以选择将该患者的信息在您的网络内推荐给同事。如果私人消息72小时没有被查看，您的反应灵敏分数将会减少，尽管该消息还可以查看，并且可以在超过72小时之后回复。

trans-unit.source: Any tips on how to answer a question?
trans-unit.target: 有任何关于如何回答问题的小贴士吗？

trans-unit.source: When providing an answer for a patient, be mindful of the style, language, and tone of your answer in addition to the relevance of your answer in relation to the question asked — just like in your clinic! Providing thoughtful and informative answers that really “hit the mark” for a patient will increase your chances of receiving a “Thank You” which has a direct impact on your DocScore.
trans-unit.target: 当为患者回答问题时，除了与问题的相关性以外，请注意您回复的风格，语言和语调——就像在您的诊所一样！提供体贴的有益的的回答将非常“hit the mark”患者，这将添加您收到“谢谢”的几率，这对您的医者评分有直接影响。

trans-unit.source: Patients will have an opportunity to pay for a shorter follow up question if they desire. You will be reimbursed for providing a short reply to follow up questions in a similar manner to the original question and responsiveness and helpfulness scores are impacted in the same fashion. Follow up answers are limited to 250 characters. Follow up questions are reimbursed at the rate of half a full question.
trans-unit.target: 如果患者要求，可以通过支付的方式再询问一个更短的后续的问题。您以回答原始问题相同的方式对后续问题给出简要回复将获得补偿，并且您的反应灵敏和乐于助人分数将以相同的方式添加。后续问题需控制在250字以内。后续问题将按半个问题的比例获得补偿

trans-unit.source: How do I make a withdrawal?

To make a withdrawal you must have a minimum balance of $100.00. Withdrawals can be made at any time in your setting menu. After your request is received you will be issued a check in the mail, PayPal payment, or a receipt confirmation your donation to a charity.
trans-unit.target: 您必须有$100.00的最小余额才可进行提款。提款可随时在您的设置菜单中进行。收到您的要求之后，将会给您发确认邮件，PayPal支付，或者确认您的善款已到达某慈善机构的收据。

trans-unit.source: Where do I go if I'd like help or support on HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 如果我想在HealthTap上帮助他人，我应该去哪里？

trans-unit.source: You can reach out to our support desk at any time by selecting the “Feedback” button under “About HealthTap” in the left navigation menu.
trans-unit.target: 通过选择左侧导航菜单中“关于HealthTap”下的“反馈”按钮，您可以随时到我们的支持台。

trans-unit.source: By registering, you have already selected a specialty, but we recognize that most doctors have several areas of practice that they are “known for” based on past training or cumulative clinical experience. We want you to be able to attract patients to your practice based on the topics you are known for in medicine and so we created topics for you to choose from that will allow you to customize your Virtual Practice on HealthTap. You are allowed to choose up to 5 known for topics and you can change them at any time.
trans-unit.target: 通过注册，您已经选择一个专科，但是我们知道大多数医生在过往培训或积累的临床经验基础上都有几个“专攻”领域。我们希望您能够在专攻的医药问题上吸引住您的患者，并且我们会为您产生一些话题供您选择帮助您自定义在HealthTap上的在线诊疗。您可以至多选择5个专攻话题，并且您可以随时更换。

trans-unit.source: What is the Top Doctors Competition”?

Once you have declared your “Known For” topics you have the ability to showcase your expertise in this area and earn the #1 spot on your block, in your neighborhood, city, state, and beyond! You can be the best in your known for areas simply by doing what you do best — helping people who are looking for your expertise. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 一旦您宣布您的“专攻”话题，您将可以展现您在该领域的专业知识并且在您所在的街区，城市，州，甚至是州以外获得第一。您只需要做您最擅长的事——帮助那些需要您专业知识的患者，您就能在您的专供领域上成为最优秀的人了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: How do I get my own customized HealthTap App or Widget?
trans-unit.target: 我如何获取我的自定义HealthTap应用程序或小工具?

trans-unit.source: How can I use HealthTap to attract new patients?
trans-unit.target: 我该如何使用HealthTap来吸引新患者？

trans-unit.source: There are several ways that you can leverage you HealthTap Virtual Practice to gain more recognition and direct more traffic to your profile and real-world practice. Here are some of the best ways to get more visibility with HealthTap:
trans-unit.target: 您有几种方式来实现您在HealthTap在线诊疗上的影响力进而赢得更多认可和更多直接交易。这里有几种在HealthTap获得更多关注度的好方法：

trans-unit.source: Points are a reflection of the body of your work as a Medical Expert on HealthTap, such as your engagement with users looking for your medical expertise, the size of your network of patients and colleagues, your contribution to the collective wisdom of the community and your support of others. Unlike DocScore, which reflects a more “real-time” snapshot of your recent participation, your points and level only rise over time.
trans-unit.target: 积分是反应您作为HealthTap上的医学专家的主体工作，比如您对于寻求您的专业医疗知识的患者的参与度，您的患者和同事的关系网大小，您对于社区集体智慧的贡献程度和其他人对您的支持。不像医者评分，其反应更多的是您近期参与的”实时”简单印象，您的积分和等级随着时间的推移只会上升。

trans-unit.source: How do I add or remove publications that I’ve co-authored?
trans-unit.target: 我该如何添加或删除我与他人合著的出版物？

trans-unit.source: Peer reviewed publications are now listed on HealthTap, and are part of your Virtual Practice. You can add, edit or remove articles that you’ve co-authored within your Profile, or add yourself as an author directly from the publications page.
trans-unit.target: 同行评审的出版物已经列在了HealthTap上，也是您在线诊疗的一部分。您可以添加，编辑或者删除您与您资料库中合著的文章，或者直接添加您作为作者的出版物的那一页。

trans-unit.source: Who can add add a description or comments to a publication?
trans-unit.target: 谁可以添加对于出版物的描述或评论？

trans-unit.source: Co-authors can add and edit a shared description of an article (so consider checking with them when modifying an existing description). Any registered medical expert on HealthTap can add comments to an article. Comments and descriptions are publicly visible, and help highlight your expertise and authorship.
trans-unit.target: 合著者能够添加编辑该文章的共同介绍（因此请在修改已有介绍的时候注意检查）。任何在HealthTap上注册的医学专家能够添加对于文章的评论。评论和介绍是对任何人可见的，帮助突出您的专业知识和原创作者

trans-unit.source: What are Curbside Consults and how do they work?
trans-unit.target: 什么是路边咨询，他们是如何工作的？

trans-unit.source: Currently in beta, Curbside Consults are a way for our expert doctors to consult with the thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors on HealthTap for free. Doctors can select the specialty their consult is distributed to, and can receive relevant, detailed peer responses to their requests. Consults submitted by doctors who answer more patient questions on HealthTap are given priority – speed up the responses you receive by answering patient questions on HealthTap today.
trans-unit.target: 目前处于检验阶段，路边咨询是一种我们专业医生向数千拥有美国执业执照医生在HealthTap上免费咨询的一种方式。医生能够选择分配给他们的咨询专长，而且能够接受关于他们要求的相关，详细的同行回复。在HealthTap上回答更多患者问题的医生所提交的咨询将排在前列——加快您今天在HealthTap上回答患者问题后收到的回复。

trans-unit.source: How can I submit a video for healthy living resolutions?
trans-unit.target: 我该如何上传健康生活方式的视频？

trans-unit.source: Adding a video to a Wellness page is a great way to inspire others to improve their health and well-being. Learn more here about our Wellness pages and how to submit your videos directly on HealthTap or via email.
trans-unit.target: 在Wellness页上添加视频是一种激励他人增强健康的好方式。在这里了解更多 关于我们的健康网页以及如何直接在HealthTap或通过电子邮件提交您的视频。

trans-unit.source: We know you’ve been waiting a while for an answer to your question, and we’d like to thank you for your patience. We also want to let you know that not all questions on HealthTap receive answers. A question is likely to go unanswered if it lacks detail, if the question is unclear, or if it contains terms with which the doctors are not familiar. Your question is much more likely to receive a response if you improve it by editing and resubmitting it.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道，为了您问题的回答，您已经等待了一段时间，我们要感谢您的耐心等待。我们也想让您知道不是所有在HealthTap的问题都能得到回答。如果一个问题不详细，问题不清楚，或者如果包含了医生不熟悉的术语，那么这个问题可能不会得到答复。如果您通过编辑以及重新提交来改进问题，您的问题很可能会收到回复。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to get your question answered faster, you can also become a HealthTap Prime subscriber for priority status in receiving answers. Being a HealthTap Prime subscriber also gives you unlimited real-time video or audio Virtual Consults with top doctors so you can ask your question of a doctor personally.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想更快地得到您问题的回答，您也可以成为一个在接收回答时是优先级状态的HealthTap Prime订购户。作为HealthTap Prime订购者还为您提供与顶级的医生无限的实时视频或音频在线咨询，所以您可以当面向医生提出您的问题。

trans-unit.source: We encourage you to look around HealthTap+ at other questions, tips, checklists, and relevant information, and use it to improve your question. trans-unit.source: You can now have a team of top doctors on-call for personalized advice and tips whenever you need it. But first, we need your help! In order for us to match you to the perfect doctors, we need you to %{open_link}complete your health profile%{close_link}.

trans-unit.source: Remember, there are lots of things that can managed without an office visit. Through HealthTap Concierge, a doctor may refill prescriptions, answer questions, and share insights specific to you and your health concerns and goals.
trans-unit.target: 请牢记，有很多事情可以在没有办公室访问的情况下进行管理。通过HealthTap贵宾台，医生可以再配方处方，回答问题，并分享关于您特定的观察以及您的健康担忧和目标。

trans-unit.source: You recently requested to connect with %{expert}. %{abbrev} hasn’t yet had a chance to review your request. In the meantime, we recommend you connect with one of these top doctors:

trans-unit.source: We saw you were interested in talking with a doctor but stopped just short of starting your consult. To help you get started we’re offering you a New Member Discount on your first consult—only %{test_drive_price} to instantly connect with a Primary Care doctor for a live voice, video or text consult (a $99/month value!).
trans-unit.target: 我们看到您有兴趣与医生交谈，但是却停止了您刚开始的咨询。为了帮助您开始使用，我们会在您第一次咨询只有%{test_drive_price} 上为您提供新会员折扣，即时与普通门诊医生进行实时视频或文本咨询(每月只需$99!)。

trans-unit.source: Discover the convenience and value of “going to the doctor” right from your phone or computer. Try today for only %{test_drive_price} and see how easy talking to a doctor can be.

trans-unit.source: Great news! %{agree_expert}, %{with_indefinite_articleagree_expert}, agrees with %{answer_expert}’s answer to your question.

trans-unit.source: This is Dr. Geoff Rutledge, the Chief Medical Officer at HealthTap. I'd like to personally offer you a benefits solution that will significantly reduce healthcare costs for your clients, deliver peace of mind for their employees, and strengthen your customer relationships. Our award-winning approach is already delighting hundreds of millions of people across the world and rapidly displacing traditional telemedicine offerings within dozens of Fortune 500 companies. Today, we are offering this proven solution to you at an unprecedented value that will help you make more money and retain your book of business.
trans-unit.target: 这是HealthTap的首席医务官Geoff Rutledge医生我想亲自为您提供一个福利解决方案，这个方案将显着降低您客户的健康医护成本，让他们的员工放心，并加强您的客户关系。我们获奖的方法已经使全世界数亿人感到愉快，并迅速取代了数十家财富500强公司的传统远程医疗产品。今天，我们以一个前所未有的价值为您提供这个成熟的解决方案，它将帮助您赚更多的钱，并保留您的业务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a Silicon Valley based company that is revolutionizing healthcare by providing individuals with immediate access to personalized information and guidance from over 71,000 highly qualified doctors with over 20 years of experience on average. We are the World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer of 2016, joining the ranks of past winners like Google, Twitter, AirBnB and Uber. Other recent accolades include:
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是一家位于硅谷的公司，它通过为个人提供即时获取个性化信息和来自超过71,000的拥有平均超过20年经验的高素质医生的指导，正在变革健康医护。我们是2016年世界经济论坛技术先锋，加入了如谷歌，Twitter，AirBnB和Uber这些过去获奖者的行列。其他最近的荣誉包括：

trans-unit.target: 给患者分析检查照片，比如乳房X线照片

trans-unit.source: Increase the visibility of radiologists to patients
trans-unit.target: 为患者提高放射科医生的可见性
对患者进行1类糖尿病的教育
减轻纤维肌痛症状的建议

trans-unit.source: Consult on gout and RA flare-ups
trans-unit.target: 有关痛风和风湿性关节炎发作的咨询
帮助患者解决自体免疫失调问题

trans-unit.source: Advise on snoring and suggested therapies
trans-unit.target: 对打鼾提供相关治疗建议
有关睡眠呼吸中止症的教育

trans-unit.source: Triage injuries for ER or office visit
trans-unit.target: 将受伤分为急诊室或普通门诊

trans-unit.source: Consult on injuries including ACL, RTC tears, and shoulder instability
trans-unit.target: 有关受伤的咨询，包括前交叉韧带受伤、RTC tears和肩关节不稳定

trans-unit.source: Clarify treatment pathways, risks, and side effects
trans-unit.target: 解释治疗的方法、风险和副作用

trans-unit.source: Expose patients to innovative therapies not offered by community urologists
trans-unit.target: 介绍患者创新疗法而不是社区的泌尿科医生

trans-unit.source: Gather information to verify or refute the need for a biopsy of prostate
trans-unit.target: 收集有关能够证实或反驳前列腺活检重要性的信息

trans-unit.source: Provide a second opinion about recommended treatment plans
trans-unit.target: 提供关于推荐治疗计划的第二意见

trans-unit.source: Advise on treatment of penile curvature
trans-unit.target: 对阴茎弯曲提供相关治疗建议
有关治疗性传播疾病的咨询
开治疗尿路感染的处方
对生殖器病变进行评估诊断

trans-unit.source: Give second opinion of surgical treatment options
trans-unit.target: 给予外科治疗选择的第二意见

trans-unit.source: Consult on AAA, carotid disease, and venous issues
trans-unit.target: 提供有关AAA、颈动脉疾病、静脉问题的咨询
通过查看是否病变来找出问题

trans-unit.source: Talk with a top gynecologist about contraceptive treatment options and get the right birth control for you — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈与最顶级的妇科医生为您&mdash讨论有关避孕的方法来和寻找最正确的生育控制方法；

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US obstetrician and gynecologist about pregnancy, STDs or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的妇产科医生获得有关怀孕、性病或者其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US gastroenterologist about stomach flu, IBS, or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的妇产科医生获得有关胃流感、肠易激综合症或者其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US neurologist about dementia, Parkinson's disease, or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的神经学家获得有关老年痴呆症、帕金森病或其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US pediatrician about rashes, vomiting, diarrhea, or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的儿科医生获得有关皮疹、呕吐、腹泻或其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US cardiologist about managing heart diseases or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的心脏病专家获得有关如何控制心脏病或其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US otolaryngologist about nose bleeds, ear infections, or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的耳鼻喉科专家获得有关流鼻血、耳部感染或其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US infectious disease specialist about about hepititis, STDs, HIV, or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的传染病学专家获得有关肝炎、性病、艾滋病或其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案

trans-unit.source: Advice and treatment from a top US dermatologist about acne, rashes, anti-aging, or any other health concerns — conveniently and privately via live video or text chat from your mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 通过移动设备或者电脑进行便捷私密的实时视频或文本交谈的方式从美国顶级的皮肤科专家获得有关痤疮、皮疹、延缓衰老或其他健康担忧&mdash的建议和治疗方案
Pearle医生局部膝关节置换术
现在可以得到一个评估

trans-unit.source: Living with Knee Pain and Considering Total Knee Replacement? Know your alternatives — less invasive knee resurfacing procedures exist and you may be a candidate! You can be evaluated by Dr Andrew Pearle, an international expert in knee surgery, to help determine which approach may be appropriate for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果一直感觉到膝盖痛，或许可以考虑一下全膝关节置换术？了解您的其他选择——存在微创膝盖重修的临床操作，所以您可以选择这个方法！Andrew Pearle医生是一个做膝关节手术国际专家，您可以从他那里获得最适合您的治疗方案。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap gets a home: 575 High St.

After several months at HealthTap's first headquarters (Ron Gutman's whiteboard-equipped home office), we opened our doors at 575 High Street in a Palo Alto office suite formerly occupied by the FBI. It was a suitable location for top secret development work. There we created the new concept of Interactive Health.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap的第一个总部（Ron Gutman的白板配备的家庭办公室）工作了几个月后，我们在之前被联邦调查局占用的位于Palo Alto办公室的575大街开始了办公室。这是一个合适的位置用于绝密开发工作。在那里，我们创造了互动健康的新概念。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosts the first ever health data-specific Hackathon with support from the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), the HHS CTO, and HealthTap fan Todd Park. Hundreds participated and 35 teams created 18 apps in less than 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在卫生和人力服务部(HHS)，HHS CTO和HealthTap粉丝Todd Park的支持下，承载了第一个关于健康数据的Hackathon。数百名参加者和35个小组在2不到24小时创造了18个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: We opened our doors to a limited audience of new moms and expecting women at the end of 2010. After previewing technology to investors in Nov, we started with hand-picked users in late 2010 and received immediate, positive, and validating feedback.
trans-unit.target: 我们在2010年年底向有限的新妈妈和期待女性的人们敞开大门。在11月向投资者预览技术后，我们在2010年年底开始与精选的用户进行即时，积极和有效的反馈。

trans-unit.source: Following months of intense work to release HealthTap to our Beta community, we gathered for our first annual planning retreat to set our goals for 2011. The retreat helped spark many new ideas and established a roadmap and metrics for success.
trans-unit.target: 经过数月的紧张工作发布HealthTap到我们的检验社区，我们聚集了我们的第一次年度规划休假，以制定我们2011年的目标。休假引发了许多新的想法，并建立了成功的路线图和指标。

trans-unit.source: We care about care and positivity. Dr. Tappy, the smiling image of the helpful physician, was created and immediately became an integral part of the HealthTap experience. Always helpful and happy, Dr. Tappy symbolizes HealthTap's dedication to providing the best, most reliable, health information to everyone at all times.
trans-unit.target: 我们关心医护和积极性。Tappy医生，作为有帮助的医生的微笑形象代表，被创建并立即成为HealthTap体验的一个组成部分。Tappy医生象征着HealthTap致力于提供最好，最可靠的健康信息，随时为所有人提供帮助和快乐。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap CEO and Founder Ron Gutman's TED talk on the "Hidden Powers of Smiling" created buzz at the 2011 conference, but the ultimate success of the talk came when it was released online. Today, the talk has been viewed by millions, translated into more than 50 languages by enthusiastic viewers across the world and published as a TED book.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 首席执行官兼创始人Ron Gutman在TED"微笑的隐藏力量"的演讲在2011年会议上创造了一个热点，但是在网上发布后获得最终成功。今天，这场演讲已被数百万人观看，被世界各地热心的观众翻译成50多种语言，并作为TED图书出版。

trans-unit.source: Cool consumer health projects come with even cooler swag! Introducing the HealthTap shoe – if you see them on someone's feet, say hi!
trans-unit.target: 冷酷消费者健康项目带有更冷酷的行囊！介绍HealthTap鞋子 - 如果您看到他们在某人的脚上，说您好！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's angels include some of the best and brightest company builders in Silicon Valley and beyond. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to create the HealthTap you see today. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的天使投资者包括一些在硅谷和其他地区最好和最聪明的公司建设者。他们支持我们的共同愿景，使我们能够创建您今天看到的HealthTap。阅读 文章 ›
第一届互动健康研讨会

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosted the first Interactive Health Symposium right in our office, attracting physician participants from across the state. The symposium created the foundation for a robust, ongoing dialogue between HealthTap and the physician community about the innovations most needed in healthcare today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在我们的办公室举办了第一次互动健康研讨会，吸引了来自全州的医生参与其中。该研讨会为HealthTap和医生社区之间关于当今健康医护最需要的创新的健康，持续对话奠定了基础。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap led in health innovation at the South by Southwest Interactive conference. Paving the way for a strong health presence at this important gathering, we hosted an interactive health meet-up to connect innovators, as well as a major gathering for the entire SXSW health community.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap领导了南方的卫生创新西南交互会议。为在这个重要的聚会上强有力的卫生存在铺平了道路，我们主办了一个互动的卫生会议，以连接创新者，并为整个SXSW卫生界举办一个重要的聚会。

trans-unit.source: The first response to an inquiry on HealthTap came from a New Jersey pediatrician, Dr. Anatoloy Belilovsky, who answered the question: "Should I be concerned about my baby's previous vaccinations?"
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap调查的第一个回复来自新泽西州的儿科医生Anatoloy Belilovsky医生，他回答了这个问题："我应该关心我宝宝以前的疫苗接种吗？"

trans-unit.source: Following our Beta launch, we opened our virtual doors to the public on Apr 19, 2011, revealing to the world our labor of love. Press included praise in TIME and Forbes, among other national publications.
trans-unit.target: 在检验版发布后，我们于2011年4月19日向公众开放了在线入口，向世界展示了我们的爱的劳动。新闻稿包括在时代和福布斯和其它国家出版物的赞扬。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's first member outside of our invited Beta group signs up. The immediate adoption of our service by consumers around the country soon leads to users from other countries as well.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的第一个会员在我们邀请的检验组之外注册。全国消费者立即采用我们的服务很快也会引来来自其他国家的用户。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap proudly sponsors TEDx Silicon Valley, the most widely viewed TEDx event in the world, with live streaming audiences in 50 countries and more than 330,000 global views. The event, themed "Living by Numbers," focused on how numbers can impact and improve our daily lives and featured speakers like Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor, and Tim O'Reilly.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap自豪地赞助TEDx硅谷，这是世界上观看次数最多的TEDx活动，在50个国家有实时观众流，超过33万个全球观点。该活动，话题为"数字生活"关注数字如何影响和改善我们的日常生活和特色的演讲者，如Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor, 和Tim O'Reilly。

trans-unit.source: Who better to share our first-hand experience in a growing start-up, building a world-class company, than top students from Stanford and beyond? HealthTap's Internship program is designed to provide a memorable educational experience to students interested in health technology and product development.
trans-unit.target: 谁最好分享我们在一个成长初创企业的第一手经验，建立一个世界级的公司，而不是斯坦福大学和其他顶级学生？HealthTap的实习计划旨在为对健康技术和产品开发感兴趣的学生提供难忘的教育体验。

trans-unit.source: A heated battle for conference room space marked the end of our tenure at our first offices in 575 High Street. We moved on up to an even better location - the former Facebook offices at 101 University Ave, Suite 100, right across from the Cal Train station in the hear of Palo Alto.
trans-unit.target: 会议室空间的激烈争夺标志着我们在575大街的第一个办公室的使用结束。我们搬到了以前的Facebook办公室，在一个更好的位置 - 101大学大道，套房100，在Calo火车站，帕洛阿尔托的中心对面。

trans-unit.source: Working with and learning from horses was just one of the many benefits of a day celebrating our launch with a retreat in the wine country near Los Gatos. The event also included horseback riding and other equestrian activities.
trans-unit.target: 使用和学习马只是一个庆祝我们发布与骑马休假的一天的许多福利之一，在洛杉矶加托斯附近的葡萄酒乡休假。。活动还包括骑马和其他马术活动。

trans-unit.source: "5,000 doctors, at your fingertips – at home or on the go" became the motto at launch for the new HealthTap Express App. Together with the physician-facing application (HealthTap Express MD), HealthTap's core Q&A functionality was captured in a novel and engaging mobile app.
trans-unit.target: "5000名医生，就在您的指尖 – 在家里或在旅行中"成为新的HealthTapExpress应用程序发布的座右铭。加上面向医生的应用程序(HealthTap Express MD)，HealthTap的核心问答功能被捕捉在一个新颖的和有吸引力的移动应用程序。

trans-unit.source: We reach 50,000 useful, relevant, and current physician-created answers on HealthTap, all available for free. The Medical Experts on HealthTap stay busy improving the quality of online health information one answer, tip, and health guide at a time.
trans-unit.target: 我们在HealthTap上提供了50,000个有用的，相关的和当前医生创建的回答，所有这些都是免费的。HealthTap的医学专家一直忙于提高在线健康信息的质量一个回答、小贴士和健康指南。

trans-unit.source: It's not just for individual physicians anymore! Group practices, hospitals, and other health organizations join HealthTap. Now, these groups can maintain a presence on HealthTap and connect with individual physicians. Five hundred physicians now participate in groups. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: 这不再只是为个别医师！群组诊疗、医院和其他卫生组织加入HealthTap。现在，这些群组可以在HealthTap上保持存在并与个别医生联系。500名医师现在参加群组。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is awarded $11.5M in Series A funding, from investors like the Mayfield Fund, Mohr Davidow Ventures, and Eric Schmidt's Innovation Endeavors. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to continue to build the HealthTap that you see today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap获得A轮融资1150万美元，来自梅菲尔德基金，Mohr Davidow Ventures和Eric Schmidt的创新奋进等投资者。他们支持我们的共同愿景，使我们能够继续建立您今天看到的HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: The team hits Carmel for the weekend on the second annual company retreat. There, we brainstormed about where HealthTap should go from here and generally how to change the world to help people smile and feel good!
trans-unit.target: 该团队在第二次年度公司休假期间突然想到Carmel周末在那里，我们集体讨论了HealthTap应该从这里开始，以及一般如何改变世界，帮助人们微笑和feel good！

trans-unit.source: When doctors feel that an answer from another physician is right on target, they can "agree" with it - immediately boosting the credibility of the answer. The answer with the most agrees is bumped to the top for users to find!
trans-unit.target: 当医生觉得来自另一医生的回答是正确的目标时，他们可以"同意"通过它 - 立即提高回答的可信性。为用户找到最同意的回答将置顶！

trans-unit.source: Our Medical Expert Network reached 10,000 doctors in early 2012 – and it's still growing! This milestone coincided with Valentine's Day, when we launched our "I <3 My Doc" campaign - celebrating physicians everywhere for their hard work and dedication to the care of others.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医学专家网络在2012年初达到了10000名医生 – 它仍在增长！这一里程碑恰好在情人节，我们启动了我们的"I <3我的文件"运动 - 庆祝各地医师的辛勤工作，并致力于照顾他人。
我们的第二届SXSW 2012互动会议

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosts the hottest Interactive Health gathering at SXSW, with more than 2,000 people on the wait list. Participants enjoyed party perks like big wheel racing and a photo booth, while simultaneously driving the mobile health movement forward.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在SXSW举办最热门的互动健康聚会，有超过2,000人在等待名单上。参加者喜欢派对福利，如大轮赛车和照片摊，同时推动移动健康运动向前进。
超级快乐开发者团体党

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's award-winning display at the first-ever Developer Block Party (sponsored by the city of Palo Alto) featured in-person doctors answering health questions of the thousands of people who stopped by our "Doctor is In" parklet.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在第一次的开发者团队（由帕洛阿尔托市赞助）的获奖显示特色医生亲自回答数千人的健康问题，我们的"医生是In&quot停止的停靠点。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's fourth internship class brought together a diverse array of students from Stanford, Berkeley, USC, and UCLA--students who added to the excitement and energy around what HealthTap is doing for the health world.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的第四个实习班汇集了来自斯坦福大学，伯克利大学，南加州大学和加州大学洛杉矶分校的学生，他们为HealthTap为健康世界而做的事情带来了兴奋和精力。

trans-unit.source: Our Medical Expert Network continued its remarkable growth, reaching 12,000 U.S.-licensed doctors in Jun 2012. These doctors are actively engaging with HealthTap members and contributing to the world’s leading knowledgebase of online health content.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医学专家网络继续显着增长，2012年6月达到12,000名拥有美国执业执照的医生。这些医生正在积极地与HealthTap会员合作，为世界领先的在线健康内容知识库做出贡献。

trans-unit.source: The New HealthTap launched as the first-ever mobile health platform, available for everyone (iPhone, iPad, Android and Web). We received positive praise from Washington Post , Bloomberg, Reuters, Forbes and Mashable, as well as TechCrunch and GigaOm among many other well known publications.
trans-unit.target: 新的HealthTap作为第一个移动健康平台推出，适用于所有人（iPhone，iPad，安卓和Web）。我们收到了包括来自华盛顿邮报，彭博，路透社，福布斯和Mashable，以及TechCrunch和GigaOm在许多其他知名出版物的积极赞扬。
医者评分突出顶级医生

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s innovative DocScore is an objective numeric rating (like a FICO score) for doctors, taking into account public information (such as years in practice, medical education, awards, and peer-reviewed publications) as well as interactions on HealthTap (including peer-endorsements and agrees).
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的医者评分的创新是医生的客观数字评级（如FICO评分），考虑到公共信息（如诊疗中的年份，医学教育，奖项和同行评审的出版物）以及HealthTap的互动（包括同行评议） 支持和同意。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s DOConnect is an interactive map showing the referral network of doctors and doctors who treat the same patients at the same time. More than 30 million connections are visible via HealthTap, and each doctor’s connections are visible directly from a doctor’s HealthTap profile page.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的DOConnect是一个交互式地图，显示医生和医生的转诊网络，同时对同一患者进行治疗。这会显示出医生的诊断网和在同一时间诊断同一个患者的医生。通过HealthTap可以看到超过3000万个连接，每名医生的连接都可以从医生的HealthTap个人资料页面直接看到。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap acquires Avvo Health and grows Directory to 1.2 million doctors
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 收购Avvo Health并将目录扩展到120万名医生

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s first acquisition, health Q&A and directory service Avvo Health, expanded HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network to more than 40,000 doctors in 128 specialties, and broadened local coverage across all 50 states. At the same time, HealthTap announced the expansion of its directory coverage to include 1.2 million U.S.-licensed doctors. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: HealthTap首次收购，健康问答和目录服务Avvo Health将HealthTap的医学专家网络扩展到了超过40,000名医生，共有128个专科，并扩展了所有50个州的本地覆盖面。与此同时， HealthTap 宣布扩大其目录覆盖范围，包括120万拥有美国执业执照的医生。阅读 文章 ›
打破为更好的健康医护

trans-unit.source: HealthTap CEO Ron Gutman was invited to present on CNBC’s “The Disrupters,” a national news series highlighting innovative companies and individuals changing the status quo.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap首席执行官Ron Gutman被邀请参加CNBC的“破坏者”，一个全国新闻系列，突出了创新公司和个人改变现状。
健康决议 健康之旅

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's new interface makes it easy and intuitive to browse health information, helping users support their health journeys. New features include health resolutions and a body browser, an easy way to explore symptoms and related conditions and treatments, all by clicking on an image of the human body.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的新界面使您可以轻松，直观地浏览健康信息，帮助用户支持他们的健康之旅。新功能包括健康解决方案和身体浏览器，一种简单的方法来探索症状和相关的条件和治疗，所有通过点击人体的图像。

trans-unit.source: CNN : HealthTap helps you keep resolutions
trans-unit.target: 美国有线电视新闻网络：HealthTap帮助您保持决定

trans-unit.source: CNN highlighted HealthTap as one of the very best apps to help you keep your New Year's health resolutions. The video feature aired on CNN during prime time, and was simulcast on 150 stations across the country. Watch video ›
trans-unit.target: CNN强调HealthTap作为最好的应用程序之一，以帮助您保持您的新年的健康决议。在黄金时段，CNN播出的视频功能，并在全国150个电台同时播出。观看视频 ›

trans-unit.source: Winter retreat envisions HealthTap’s next generation
trans-unit.target: 冬季休假设想HealthTap的下一代

trans-unit.source: HealthTap team members gathered in Northern California for our semi-annual retreat, where we hosted a select group of doctors from diverse practices across the country. They participated in activities that helped us envision the next generation of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap团队会员为我们半年度休假齐聚北加州，在那里我们主办了一个从全国各地多样化的诊疗选择医学的群组。他们参加了帮助我们设想下一代HealthTap的活动。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap brings doctor-created tips straight to your mobile device or computer. To keep healthy living top of mind, users can subscribe to health topics of interest, and receive daily doctor-created tips, suggestions, or bits of advice delivered via email or by SMS push notifications to mobile devices. Users can also discover and browse TipTaps on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将医生创建的小贴士直接推送到您的移动设备或计算机。为了保持放心健康的生活，用户可以订购感兴趣的健康话题，并且接收通过电子邮件或短信在移动设备上接收每天医生创建的小贴士、建议或一点忠告的推送通知。用户还可以在HealthTap上发现和浏览推心小贴士。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap, featured globally on Google Play’s Android app market, quickly becomes one of the top 10 most popular health apps worldwide.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap，在Google Play安卓应用程序市场推出，迅速成为全球前十大最受欢迎的健康应用程序之一。

trans-unit.source: Mar 2013 also marked the availability of increased personalization to millions on the HealthTap platform. Now when members ask questions, they are prompted with the option to add additional personal information related to the question they are asking. This provides doctors with relevant context and improves the specificity of the answers members receive.
trans-unit.target: 2013年3月，还在HealthTap平台上标记了数百万用户的个性化增长。现在，当会员提出问题时，系统会小贴士他们添加与他们要求的问题相关的其他个人信息的选项。这向医生提供相关来龙去脉并且改进会员接收的回答的专一性。

trans-unit.source: One of the Top Four Out of 40,000 Apps!
In Mar 2013, HealthTap was featured on the TODAY Show as one of the four best health apps from among the 40,000 health applications available for consumers. Watch video ›
trans-unit.target: 2013年3月，HealthTap在今日秀上作为消费者提供的4万个健康应用程序中的4个最好的健康应用程序之一。观看视频 ›

trans-unit.source: This month HealthTap unveiled its new initiative called “Curbside Consults.” The program allows a HealthTap physician to use the platform’s network to broadcast a question to other physicians.
trans-unit.target: 本月，HealthTap公布了名为“路边内容”的新计划。该程序允许HealthTap医生使用平台的网络向其他医生广播问题。

trans-unit.source: The full spectrum of doctor knowledge is made available via HealthTap. Doctor-to-doctor Q&A, concise doctor updates, and full-length doctor posts are released.
trans-unit.target: 医生知识的所有范围通过HealthTap提供。医生与医生的问答，简明的医生更新和全职医生的帖子。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap reaches 7.5 million monthly unique visitors, two million app downloads, and more than half a billion doctor answers served.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap每月独立访问者达750万，应用下载量为200万，医生回答超过5亿。

trans-unit.source: In May 2013, HealthTap launched AppRX so our users can get app recommendations from real doctors. With AppRX, we make it fast and easy to find health and wellness apps by creating intuitive, user-friendly categories, and posting doctor recommendations and written reviews. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: 在2013年5月，HealthTap推出了“App医生评测”，因此我们的用户可以从真正的医生获得应用程序的建议。使用App医生评测，我们通过创建直观，用户友好的类别，并为应用程序发布医生建议和书面评论，使其快速，轻松地找到健康与保健应用程序。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: In the summer of 2013, HealthTap had the pleasure of hosting a group of leading engineers, designers, product managers, data experts, and innovators in diverse industries to envision and design the “future of health” in the year 2020. It was a successful day of thought-provoking debate and ideas of how to disrupt the health space.
trans-unit.target: 在2013年夏天，HealthTap很荣幸地主办了一个领先的工程师，设计师，产品经理，数据专家和不同行业的创新者，以构想和设计2020年的“健康未来”。这是成功的一天，发人深省的辩论和如何破坏健康空间的想法。

trans-unit.source: First doctor conference with Top Doctors
trans-unit.target: 与顶级医生的第一次医生会议

trans-unit.source: July 2013 marked the first ever HealthTap Doctors’ Conference. Doctors from around the country from multiple specialities, practice sizes, and various stages in their careers offered insights and feedback on the past, present, and future of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 2013年7月是史上第一次HealthTap医生会议。来自多个专科，诊疗大小和职业生涯的各个阶段的全国各地的医生提供了对HealthTap的过去，现在和未来的见解和反馈。

trans-unit.source: In Oct 2013, HealthTap received the 10,000th user note telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life. By making digital health personal, we're working hard to help many more thousands all over the world live longer, healthier lives. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: 在2013年十月，HealthTap收到了第10,000条用户通知告诉我们在HealthTap上挽救一条生命。通过使电子健康私人化，我们致力于帮助全世界更多人活得更长久更健康。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: Since launching our mobile health platform in Jul 2012, we've served more than one billion answers in response to users' health questions, and have created and organized the world's most extensive knowledge base of user questions matched to answers from trusted doctors.
trans-unit.target: 自从我们在2012年七月发布了移动健康平台，我们向用户的健康问题提供了超过十亿条回答，我们也创建了世界上最广泛的将用户问题和受信任的医生的回答相匹配的知识库。

trans-unit.source: We were thrilled when the 50,000th doctor signed up to join our Medical Expert Network! The thank you notes keep pouring in from members who have been helped by our devoted and inspirational doctors. And the doctors are happy too! Word of mouth is spreading in the medical community about HealthTap and how it is helping millions of people around the world feel good!
trans-unit.target: 当5万名医生报名加入我们的医学专家网络时，我们感到非常高兴！我们奉献的和鼓舞人心的医生帮助过的会员的感谢信持续的涌入。医生也很高兴！口碑传播在医疗社区关于HealthTap和它如何帮助世界各地的数百万人feel good！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Labs launches its first app - Talk To Docs. Just speak a question, and the app reads back answers from top doctors. Uses advanced natural language processing, artificial intelligence, and advanced voice recognition technology, Talk To Docs recognizes the health topics you’re interested in, and delivers the most appropriate answers. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: HealthTap实验室发布他的第一款应用程序 - Talk To Docs.仅仅说出一个问题，这款应用程序就会从顶级医生那里获取回答。Talk To Docs使用先进的自然语言处理、人工智能和先进的声音识别技术来识别您感兴趣的话题并向您推送最适合的回答。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: HealthTap continued to be featured in national press, with articles in Inc. Magazine (November 2013) and Forbes (November 2013), among many others celebrating the changes that HealthTap is making in the health field.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap继续在国家新闻界发表，其中包括华纳出版社 (November 2013)和福布斯(November 2013), 在许多其他人中庆祝HealthTap在健康领域正在发生的变化。

trans-unit.source: A mini-documentary on HealthTap was released underscoring the importance of the company’s mission to revolutionize the doctor-patient relationship. The film featured patients and doctors who spoke about the deep impact HealthTap is having on their lives. Watch video ›
trans-unit.target: 发布了一部关于HealthTap的小纪录片，强调了公司使命改变医生与患者关系的重要性。这部电影精选了患者和医生，他们谈到了HealthTap对他们生活的深远影响。观看视频 ›
HealthTap发布智能手表应用程序

trans-unit.source: HealthTap redefines healthcare once again and becomes first health app on Google’s Android wear. Now millions around the world get the power of personalized doctor reminders and tips on the go!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap再次重新定义健康医护，成为Google Android Wear上的第一个健康应用程序。现在世界各地的数百万人忙于获得专属于您的医生提醒和小贴士！

trans-unit.source: We move to a new, bigger, better, sunnier office in the heart of downtown Palo Alto!
trans-unit.target: 我们搬到在帕洛阿尔托市中心的一个新的，更大，更好，更阳光的办公室！

trans-unit.source: Using HealthTap Prime, doctors can make Virtual House Calls via video chats, regular phone calls, or message exchanges. Members of HealthTap+ Prime can request a Virtual House Call at anytime, from anyplace, using any PC or mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 使用HealthTap Prime，医生可以通过视频聊天，普通电话或消息发送进行在线出诊。HealthTap+ Prime的会员可以随时使用任何个人电脑或移动设备从任何地点请求在线出诊。

trans-unit.source: Doctor house calls are making a come-back with a high-tech twist
trans-unit.target: 高科技手段使医生出诊重新出现

trans-unit.source: The launch of HealthTap Prime received worldwide media coverage, including a feature on Good Morning America!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime的推出获得了全球媒体报道，其中包括在早安美国的播出！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hits two billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap回复用户的健康问题已达到了20亿份回答。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches on Apple’s Health App
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在苹果的健康应用程序上推出

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launched on Apple’s Health App, providing a seamless way to get your data from device to doctor. Doctors can use the Apple Health App data to provide better recommendations, as well as actionable doctor-created checklists and personalized tips.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在苹果的健康应用程序上推出，提供了一种将您的数据从设备到医生的无缝方式。医生可以使用苹果健康应用程序的数据提供更好的建议，以及可行的医生创建的清单和个性化小贴士。

trans-unit.source: With HealthTap Concierge, you can connect with your own doctor from anywhere via video or text consults for a low per-consult fee. No monthly subscription required. Create your own 24/7 Care-Team and get a 2nd, 3rd, or 10th opinion from doctors in more than 100 specialties!
trans-unit.target: 有了HealthTap贵宾台，为了每次低的咨询费用，您可以通过视频或文本咨询从任何地方与自己的医生联系。不需要每月订购。创建自己的24/7全天候医护团队，并从超过100个专科的医生获得第2，第3或第10意见！
第一个App医生评测年度报告

trans-unit.source: HealthTap releases its first annual report on the top health and medical apps available today. Thousands of doctors on HealthTap independently reviewed tens of thousands of health apps and provided recommendations for some of the ones they deemed the best among the 100,000 health and wellness apps available in the iOS and Android app stores.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap很荣幸地发布关于可用的顶级健康和医疗应用程序的第一份年度报告。HealthTap的医生已经独立审核了数以万计的健康应用程序，并为iOS和Android应用商店中的10万个健康与保健应用程序中的一些提供了建议。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches RateRx, the first large-scale resource created by doctors to help consumers understand the effectiveness of drugs and treatments based on doctor’s real-world experience with medications. RateRx empowers more informed discussions between patients and doctors about treatment options.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap发布了Rate医生评测，这是医生创建的第一个大规模资源，帮助消费者基于医生现实世界的药物经验来了解药物和治疗的有效性。Rate医生评测使患者和医生之间就治疗选择进行更多的知情讨论。
第20,000封“挽救了生命”的感谢信！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap received the 20,000th note from a customer telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap收到了第20,000封消费者的信告诉我们在HealthTap上挽救一条生命。

trans-unit.source: Three new apps for Apple Watch
trans-unit.target: 为苹果手表的3款新的应用程序

trans-unit.source: HealthTap remains on the forefront of digital health by being offering the first consumer healthcare apps for Apple Watch. DocNow, the first “Affordable Care App,” delivers instant access to doctors on call 24/7 for only $2.99. HealthTap for Apple Watch helps you stay on top of your health with a tap on your wrist. HealthTap for Doctors lets doctors to manage their Virtual Practices right from their Apple Watches.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过为苹果手表提供第一款消费者健康医护应用程序，依然走在数字健康的前列。DocNow，第一个“价格实惠的医护应用程序”，只需2.99美元，即可提供24/7全天候即时的访问医生电话。Apple Watch的HealthTap可以帮助您在手腕上轻触，保持身体健康。HealthTap for Doctors让医生从他们的苹果手表管理他们的在线诊疗。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap crosses three billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap回复用户的健康问题已达到了30亿份回答。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap wins the 2015 Webby Award—called “The Internet’s highest honor” by the New York Times—in the Mobile Sites & Apps: Health & Fitness Category.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap赢得了2015年Webby奖 - 被纽约时报称为“互联网的最高荣誉” - 在移动网站和应用程序：健康与健身类别。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap announces its collaboration with Quest Diagnostics to enable doctors to order diagnostic testing services for patients.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap宣布与Quest Diagnostics实验室合作，使医生能够为患者订购诊断检验服务。
世界经济论坛技术先锋

trans-unit.source: The World Economic Forum selects HealthTap as 2015 Technology Pioneer for its significant global potential to make virtual healthcare accessible to everyone.
trans-unit.target: 世界经济论坛选择 HealthTap 作为2015技术先锋，因为其巨大的全球潜力，使每个人都可以使用在线健康医护。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Compass gives employees of Flex access to efficient, world-class healthcare
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Compass为Flex的员工提供高效，世界一流的健康医护

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches Compass, a revolutionary new personal healthcare application that will give employees of Flex the ability to “tap in” to intelligent and cost-effective healthcare 24/7. HealthTap Compass serves as a hub for managing all employees’ healthcare needs, from information to prescriptions and even lab test referrals and interpretations, and will replace the traditional “benefits card.”
trans-unit.target: HealthTap发布了Compass，这是一个革命性的新型个人健康医护应用程序，将让Flex的员工能够24/7全天候“轻触”智能化和具有成本效益的健康医护。HealthTap Compass作为一个中心，用于管理所有员工的健康医护需求，从信息到处方甚至转诊和解释实验室检验，并将取代传统的“福利卡”。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap expands globally, unveiling its new “Health Operating System™ (HOPES)™" for hospitals, clinics, and community-based programs worldwide, starting with the Waikato District Health Board in New Zealand.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在全球扩张，揭示其新的“健康操作系统和贸易; (HOPES)和贸易;“用于世界各地的医院，诊所和社区计划，从新西兰的怀卡托区卫生局开始。

trans-unit.source: More than 250 million users have accessed HealthTap doctors’ expertise in the form of answers and curated articles from the world’s largest doctor-created knowledgebase.
trans-unit.target: 超过2.5亿用户以世界上最大的医生创建的知识库的回答和策划的文章的形式访问了HealthTap医生的专业知识。

trans-unit.source: Global Rounds: groundbreaking social learning for doctors
trans-unit.target: 全球巡回：为医生提供开创性的社会学习

trans-unit.source: Clinicians around the world can receive continuing medical education (CME) credits for answering patient questions, providing peer review on other doctor answers, and participating in discussions about challenging medical cases in HealthTap Global Rounds, the only digital learning where doctors can collaboratively solve real patient cases with other top doctors.
trans-unit.target: 世界各地的医生可以通过回答患者的问题，对其他医生的回答发表自己的见解和积极参加并在HealthTap全球巡回讨论一些具有挑战性的医学问题来获得持续性医学教育(CME)学分。HealthTap全球巡回是唯一一名医生可以和其他顶级医生合作解决患者问题的数字化学习之地。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap SOS offers solution for disaster relief
trans-unit.target: HealthTap SOS为赈灾提供解决方案

trans-unit.source: HealthTap now helps victims of natural disasters and terrorist attacks with HealthTap SOS, which it plans to license to municipalities and insurance firms around the world. In case of an emergency such as a hurricane or tsunami, residents of an affected area will be able to text, call, or video chat in real time with one of HealthTap's network of more than 100,000 doctors. The company will aggregate data based on these interactions pushing it back to relief forces, as well as to the government and to global media outlets.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过HealthTap SOS来帮助那些遭受自然灾害和恐怖袭击的受害者，它希望通过这样给直辖市和全国各地的保险公司颁发执业执照。在像飓风和海啸这样的紧急情况下，受影响地区的居民将能够立即和HealthTap的100000多名医生进行实时文本，电话，或者视频聊天。公司将搜集这些建立在相互交流的数据给救援部队，政府以及全球媒体。

trans-unit.source: More than 100,000 U.S. licensed doctors have joined HealthTap in its virtual care revolution, enabling people everywhere to access quality care from any mobile device or personal computer, and for doctors to deliver care at anytime from anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 超过100,000位拥有美国执业执照的医生加入了HealthTap的在线医护革命，使各地的人能够通过任何移动设备或电脑来获得优质医护，使医生能够随时随地为他人提供帮助

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hits four and a half billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap回复用户的健康问题已达到了45亿份回答。

trans-unit.source: First-of-its-kind doctor training and certification in virtual care
trans-unit.target: 首屈一指的医生培训和在线医护认证

trans-unit.source: Doctors can now get official continuing medical education (CME) credits for updating their expertise to include delivering virtual care.
trans-unit.target: 医生现在可以获得官方继续医学教育（CME）学分，更新他们的专业知识，包括提供在线医护。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap chat bot for Facebook's Messenger app
trans-unit.target: 为Facebook的Messenger应用程序的HealthTap 聊天机器人

trans-unit.source: HealthTap was the only health-focused company to be invited by Facebook to create a chat bot for the new Facebook Messenger app. HealthTap’s bot allows users to type a question into Messenger any time and receive free responses from doctors.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是唯一一家以健康为重点的公司，由Facebook邀请为新的Facebook Messenger应用程序创建聊天机器人。HealthTap的机器人允许用户随时输入一个问题到Messenger，并收到医生的免费回复。

trans-unit.source: Partnership with New Zealand’s Waikato District Health Board offers virtual care to rural residents
trans-unit.target: 与新西兰的怀卡托区卫生局合作为农村居民提供在线医护

trans-unit.source: Based on HealthTap HOPES™, New Zealand’s first “virtual hospital” gives more than one million patients the ability to talk to their doctors via video, audio, or text chat rather than travel to an distant outpatient clinic, improving both access and health outcomes for the Waikato population.
trans-unit.target: 基于HealthTap HOPES和贸易;, 新西兰第一家“在线医院”为100多万患者提供了通过视频，音频或文本聊天与医生交谈的能力，而不是前往一个遥远的门诊诊所，从而改善了怀卡托人群的获取和健康状况。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap acquires Docphin, brings comprehensive medical education to doctors for free
trans-unit.target: HealthTap收购Docphin，为医生免费提供全面的医学教育

trans-unit.source: By acquiring Docphin, a prime educational service for doctors and an emerging go-to resource for new publications in the medical literature, HealthTap can guide doctors to the latest developments and provide them with personalized alerts and updates on topics relevant to their specialties and expertise.
trans-unit.target: 通过收购Docphin，医生的主要教育服务和为在医学文献中新出版物的新兴定向资源，HealthTap可以指导医生最新的发展，并为他们提供与他们的专科和专业相关的话题的个性化消息和更新。

trans-unit.source: Group virtual consults with live translators
trans-unit.target: 有实时翻译的群组在线咨询

trans-unit.source: HealthTap begins offering virtual consults that include multiple participants such as family members, caregivers, specialists, and live translators. This breakthrough service removes language barriers and dramatically expands access to high-quality, immediate care to HealthTap users in 174 countries around the world.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap开始提供在线咨询，包括多个参与者例如家庭会员，照顾者，专家和实时翻译员。这一突破性服务消除了语言障碍，并大大提高了全球174个国家的HealthTap用户的高质量，即时的医护的获取。

trans-unit.source: Access a team of top primary care doctors “on call” 24/7 for you and your loved ones
trans-unit.target: 通过24/7全天候“随传随到”您可以为自己或您的爱人快速获得一个顶级的普通门诊医生团队

trans-unit.source: Total peace of mind with immediate 24/7 help
trans-unit.target: 通过24/7全天候的帮助您可以立即放心

trans-unit.source: Choose video or voice chat, from any mobile device or computer
trans-unit.target: 在任何移动设备或者电脑上选择视频或者语音聊天
优先化的24/7全天候用户支持

trans-unit.source: Early access to new features and functionality on HealthTap
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上对新功能的早期访问

trans-unit.source: Exclusive invitations to private HealthTap events and conferences
trans-unit.target: 私人HealthTap事件和会议的专属邀请

trans-unit.source: Access the world’s leading online knowledgebase of doctor-created health information.
trans-unit.target: 访问医生创建的世界级领先的在线知识库的健康信息。
获得美丽的，很小的小贴士

trans-unit.source: Talk immediately with a live Doctor over video, voice, or text chat
trans-unit.target: 通过视频、语音或聊天可以立即和一个在线的医生进行交流

trans-unit.source: Ask any health question and get a doctor’s response--often within minutes
trans-unit.target: 您可以向一名医生询问有关健康的问题并且迅速获得回答

trans-unit.source: Get tips and checklists to help you manage your health goals
trans-unit.target: 通过小贴士和清单来完成您的健康目标

trans-unit.source: Stay on top of the latest health news and research
trans-unit.target: 掌握最新的健康新闻和研究结果

trans-unit.source: Check spelling of words and medicines:
trans-unit.target: 检查单词和药物的拼写：

trans-unit.source: If you’re a minor, get an adult to help:
trans-unit.target: 如果您是未成年人，请通过成年人获得帮助：

trans-unit.source: Your Allergies Can Be Treated Today!
trans-unit.target: 在当今可以治疗您的过敏！

trans-unit.source: You are not alone. 50 million people in the United States suffer from allergy symptoms and its prevalence is increasing, affecting as many as 30 percent of adults and up to 40 percent of children. Allergies can be frustrating and can be an annoyance if not properly treated. At HealthTap, we have licensed qualified doctors who can help make you feel good! We're here 24/7, to help with prescriptions, treatment and advice. What are you waiting for?
trans-unit.target: 您不是一个人。在美国有5000万人患有过敏症状并且患病率正在不断变高，影响了30%的成年人和40%的儿童。如果没有适当的治疗过敏会令人沮丧和烦恼。在HealthTap，我们有拥有执业执照医生使您feel good！我们在这里24/7全天候帮助提供处方，治疗和建议。那么您还在等什么？

trans-unit.source: Connect with a doctor in under two minutes today and alleviate those allergy frustrations!
trans-unit.target: 立刻在2分钟内与医生联系您就可以缓解那些过敏痛苦！

trans-unit.source: Get Help with Your Flu/Cold Symptoms Now!
trans-unit.target: 现在您就可以为您的流感或感冒症状来寻求帮助！

trans-unit.source: Achoo! Being sick can make you feel helpless and alone. Sometimes, all you need is a quick doctor chat to get a basic prescription, but you don't want to deal with the hassles of the waiting room. With HealthTap, you can talk to a doctor in under 2 minutes from the comfort of your own bed!
trans-unit.target: 啊嚏生病会使您感到无助和孤单有时候，您只是想和医生进行一个快速的交流并且得到相应解决问题的处方，可是您又不想排队去看病。有了HealthTap，您就可以在您的床上2分钟内轻松快速地联系到一名医生！

trans-unit.source: What are you waiting for? Talk to a doctor in less time than it takes to drive there!
trans-unit.target: 那么您还在等什么？和医生交谈的时间比您开车去医院的时间还短！

trans-unit.source: Talk to a Doctor Privately Now!
trans-unit.target: 立即与医生进行私人交谈！

trans-unit.source: Questions about STDs? HealthTap doctors can offer private confidential advice for your condition. Doctors are standing by 24/7 to offer help, treatment and prescriptions.

trans-unit.source: Connect with a doctor in minutes in the privacy of your home! Get Confidential Help Now
trans-unit.target: 您在家几分钟内就可以与医生开始私人交谈！立即获得保密的帮助

trans-unit.source: A Doctor is Standing by to Answer All Your Pregnancy Questions Now!
trans-unit.target: 医生现在随时恭候为您回答有关怀孕的问题

trans-unit.source: Pregnancy is a beautiful but complicated process. There are thousands of questions every parent wants to ask but frequently forgets during regular doctor visits. With HealthTap, you can have a doctor on demand anytime, anywhere!
trans-unit.target: 怀孕是一个美妙却又十分复杂的过程家长们总是有很多想要问的问题，但是每次都会在定期检查的时候忘记询问。有了HealthTap，您就可以随时随地获得医生的建议！

trans-unit.source: Connect with a doctor in minutes via phone, tablet or computer, 24/7. We're here to help and make sure you and your newborn feel good! Try us today!
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过手机、平板、电脑24/7全天候数分钟内与医生获得联系。我们会帮助您和您的宝宝feel good！立刻尝试！

trans-unit.source: Get Treatment for Your Skin Condition Now!
trans-unit.target: 立刻为您的皮肤问题找到合适的治疗方案吧！

trans-unit.source: Skin conditions result from a number of factors and can reduce your quality of life. It's important to have a doctor evaluate your condition to ensure it is not something more serious than a minor irritation. At HealthTap, you can connect to a doctor in minutes via chat or video to get peace of mind!
trans-unit.target: 有很多情况会引起皮肤问题，这会下降您的生活质量。医生在为您检查之后告诉您并没有什么大碍只是过敏是一件很重要的事情。在HealthTap，您可以通过聊天或视频在数分钟内联系医生使自己放心！

trans-unit.resname:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.source:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.target:
RateRx代表了第一个针对有经验的医生在他们各自的专业领域所使用的治疗特定情况患者的手段的全面性评估。与其他研究在特定的情况下评价治疗有效性不同的是，RateRx希望获得顶级医生深入而长期的实际经验来获取最佳治疗方法。推荐一旦被提交就无法更改，但是在提交打分之后，医生可以查看其它医生的评分并进行评论。患者可以从这种医生集体智慧中受益，让他们能够看到对相同症状的不同治疗方式是如何被评分与评价的。打分是基于药品的通用名称的，但是也会显示品牌名称，准许医生对特定的药品进行评分。该调查不会区分不同品牌的药物对同一种药物治疗方式的评分。

好

trans-unit.resname:
Doctors can provide care and recommend and prescribe appropriate treatments. New treatment prescriptions and refills (both excluding controlled drugs), which can be sent to your local pharmacy, are available where medically indicated and deemed appropriate by the treating doctor based on your Virtual Consult.

Enjoy the convenience of having prescription treatments sent to your local pharmacy, whether you're at home or on vacation.Learn more ›
trans-unit.source:
Doctors can provide care and recommend and prescribe appropriate treatments. New treatment prescriptions and refills (both excluding controlled drugs), which can be sent to your local pharmacy, are available where medically indicated and deemed appropriate by the treating doctor based on your Virtual Consult.

trans-unit.resname: We're committed to delivering a delightful experience with our doctors that leaves you feeling good. If you're unhappy with the quality and helpfulness of the Virtual Consult, you may contact us at any time to request a refund! We guarantee you'll be satisfied:)

trans-unit.resname: This guarantee is subject to your submission to HealthTap a documented explanation supporting your request for a refund. All determinations of your eligibility for a refund are made solely by HealthTap and are final once HealthTap reaches its decision.

trans-unit.resname:
When you request to connect with a doctor, we will notify the doctor via email (as available). You will be notified if you are confirmed as this doctor's patient or accepted by the doctor for virtual consults. Please note: doctors do not always receive or respond to these requests, so never delay seeking or receiving care in person as needed.
SeeAdditional Information
trans-unit.source:
When you request to connect with a doctor, we will notify the doctor via email (as available). You will be notified if you are confirmed as this doctor's patient or accepted by the doctor for virtual consults. Please note: doctors do not always receive or respond to these requests, so never delay seeking or receiving care in person as needed.
See Additional Information

trans-unit.resname: They have returned with a critical value that require your attention.

trans-unit.resname: You may have a follow-up consult with Dr. <%= doctor.name %> to understand what these results mean and what to do next.
trans-unit.source: You may have a follow-up consult with Dr. <%= doctor.name %> to understand what these results mean and what to do next.

trans-unit.resname: We encourage you to have a follow-up consult with a doctor again to understand what these results mean and how they affect you.
trans-unit.source: We encourage you to have a follow-up consult with a doctor again to understand what these results mean and how they affect you.

trans-unit.resname: You must provide your interpretation of these results and your advice to the patient using the chat. If a follow-up consult is needed, you may indicate this in your note.This is required before we can send the results to the patient.
trans-unit.source: You must provide your interpretation of these results and your advice to the patient using the chat. If a follow-up consult is needed, you may indicate this in your note. This is required before we can send the results to the patient.
