trans-unit.source: “I was traveling in Spain and noticed a rash on my legs. Just took 5 minutes from an app on my phone to get a face-to-face consult with a doctor, and received a checklist that helped clear my rash in just two days!"
trans-unit.target: “我在西班牙旅行，注意到我腿上有皮疹。只需花5分钟就可以从我的手机上的应用程序得到面对面咨询医生，并收到一份清单，在短短两天里帮助清除我的皮疹！

trans-unit.source: “When my dad got sick, we were in California and he was in Thailand. Thanks to HealthTap, we were able to get him the help he needed, stay in the loop, and get peace of mind."
trans-unit.target: “当我爸爸生病了，我们在加利福尼亚，而他在泰国。因为HealthTap，我们能够放心地不断地提供他所需要的帮助。

trans-unit.source: “I received call from a patient who was worried about potential side effects of the new treatment recommended by local doctors, and initiated a HealthTap Prime consult for second opinion - from a hospital in Saudi Arabia."
trans-unit.target: “我收到一名来自沙特阿拉伯的一家医院的患者的电话，他担心当地医生推荐的新治疗的潜在副作用，并发起了HealthTap Prime咨询以获得第二意见。”
他们可以得到咨询，治疗，

trans-unit.source: “Without HealthTap, I’d still be searching on the Internet for my symptoms. HealthTap doctors guide me and help me through my health concerns."
trans-unit.target: “没有HealthTap，我仍然在互联网上搜索我的症状。HealthTap医生指导我，通过对我的健康的关注来帮助我。

trans-unit.source: “At first I was not a person with good health. I was lazy and weak but by following doctors’ tips and advice on HealthTap, I am now a healthy and strong person."
trans-unit.target: “起初我的身体不是很健康。我懒惰并且体弱，但通过遵照HealthTap医生的小贴士和建议，我现在是一个健康和强大的人。”

trans-unit.source: “Wonderful interface to speck directly face to face with patients, provide them a database of expert answers to health questions, and ongoing coaching for health and wellness through checklists."

trans-unit.source: Would you like to see a doctor now? Other doctors and myself are standing by to connect with you now via video or text chat.

trans-unit.target: 查找目标或话题（例如，减肥）
什么可以使人们 FEEL GOOD?

trans-unit.source: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois. Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer. As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs. Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite, and other successful Silicon Valley startups.
trans-unit.target: 当革命性的初创公司需要大胆的建议、有效的训练和诚恳的反馈时，他们向Keith Rabois求助。Keith最初是贝宝的一名高级主管，接着在领英为领导团队供职，又在Square担任公司首席运营官。作为一名董事会会员，他从第一年开始带领Yelp!和Xoom通过成功的首次公开募股，同时也向其他志同道合的企业投资。Keith是YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite 和其他硅谷成功初创公司的早期投资人。

trans-unit.source: Sonja Perkins is the Managing Director of Menlo Ventures, where she focuses on Internet, communications, and software. Her investments and board seats include: Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (Symantic), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (McAfee), and Vermeer Technologies (Microsoft). She serves as a director of the Western Association of Venture Capitalists (WAVC).
trans-unit.target: Sonja Perkins是门罗风投的总经理，她关注互联网、通讯和软件。她的投资和董事会席位包括：Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (赛门铁克), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (迈克菲), 和Vermeer Technologies (微软)。她在西方风险资本家协会担任总监。

trans-unit.source: Emily Melton has served as a partner at Mayfield Fund and Draper Fisher Jurvetson, where she helped build each firm's consumer investment portfolio. She has served on the boards of NearbyNow, RedFin, and ShareThis, and was responsible for investments in Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (Google), RichRelevance, and Flux (MTVNetworks).
trans-unit.target: Emily Melton是梅菲尔德基金和德丰杰的合伙人，她帮助各个公司组建消费投资组合。她在NearbyNow, RedFin和ShareThis的董事会任职并负责Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (谷歌), RichRelevance 和Flux (MTVNetworks)的投资。

trans-unit.source: Skip is a Partner with Asset Management Company, where he invests in mobility, datacenter, and health science technology sectors. He has founded two startups, and has extensive experience in operational experience in software, visual systems, and government sales. He also serves on the board of the Johnson Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Skip是资产管理公司的合伙人，他向移动性，数据中心和健康科学科技部门投资。他创建了两个初创公司并在软件、视觉系统和政府销售中拥有广泛的运营经验。他也在约翰逊基金会的董事会任职。

trans-unit.source: Luc builds and grows teams, leads innovative Web products and optimizes SEO, SEM, and viral to scale online businesses to reach millions of customers. When he was 21, Luc founded www.travelpod.com, the world’s first travel blogging platform, which was later acquired by TripAdvisor/Expedia. As general manager at Expedia and then at TripAdvisor, Luc led the creation of two award-winning products: TripWow (“WebAward for Outstanding Achievement”—Web Marketing Association) and the Traveler IQ Challenge (Excellence in Social Media – CNMA). Today, he manages a top-notch team of analysts and engineers as VP of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) at TripAdvisor. He's the general manager for several TripAdvisor products like TripWow, the Traveler IQ Challenge, and TravelPod, which was named by PC Magazine as a “Top 100 site you can’t live without”. In addition to advising for HealthTap, Luc also acts as an advisor for several other incubators and high-growth startups, including FounderFuel and BusBud.
trans-unit.target: Luc构建和增强团队，领导创新的网络产品，并优化搜索引擎优化，标准电子组件和病毒来扩展在线业务，以覆盖数百万客户。当他21岁时，Luc创立了www.travelpod.com，这是世界上第一个旅行博客平台，后来被猫途鹰/智游天下收购。作为智游天下的总经理，后来在猫途鹰，Luc领导了两个获奖产品的创建：TripWow (“WebAward卓越成就&rdquo - 网络营销协会)和地理 IQ大挑战（社交媒体卓越—通信网络与制造应用标准）。今天，他作为猫途鹰的副总裁在搜索引擎优化（SEO）方面管理着一个顶级的分析师和工程师团队。他是几个猫途鹰产品的总经理，如TripWow，地理IQ大挑战和TravelPod，它被PC杂志命名为“100强您无法离开的网站”。除了担任 HealthTap的顾问，Luc还是其他几个孵化器和高增长初创公司的顾问，包括FounderFuel和BusBud。

trans-unit.source: Alex is the VP of Growth at Facebook and manages user acquisition and retention, helping drive mobile adoption, self-service advertiser/page admin acquisition, and helping drive other product adoption as required. The channels he uses tend to be: SEO/SEM, email/sms/push notification marketing and onsite merchandising. Alex also manages the internationalization team at Facebook. Prior to Facebook in 2007, Alex spent three years at eBay in email marketing. Alex holds an MSc degree in Physics from the University of Cambridge.
trans-unit.target: Alex是Growth at Facebook的副总裁，管理用户的获取和保留，帮助推动移动应用，自助服务广告客户/网页管理员获取，以及帮助推动其他产品的采用。他使用的渠道往往是：搜索引擎优化/ 标准电子组件，电子邮件/短信/推送通知营销和现场商品销售。Alex还在脸谱网管理国际化团队。在2007年的脸谱网之前，Alex花了三年时间在eBay在电子邮件营销方面。Alex拥有剑桥大学物理学硕士学位。

trans-unit.source: In its current state, our healthcare system is expensive, difficult to access, and error prone. On the brink of a massive reform in healthcare, dedicated, bright entrepreneurs and technologists can bring a great deal to the table by developing creative, forward thinking solutions that leverage health care professionals. HealthTap is at the forefront of this development, improving patient care by creating quick, easy, and affordable access to doctors everywhere. The future of healthcare is at the confluence of big data, smart algorithms, and simple-to-use interfaces that will provide amplification of our MD's resources: HealthTap is breaking ground in all three, and we're excited to help them make their compelling vision a transformative reality.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的状态下，我们的健康医护系统是昂贵的，难以访问，并且容易出错。在医疗保健大规模改革的边缘，专注，聪明的企业家和技术专家可以通过开发利用健康医护专业人士的创新，前瞻性的解决方案，带来很大的好处。HealthTap 处于这一发展的前沿，通过创建快速，轻松，价格实惠的医疗服务，改善患者医护。健康医护的未来是大数据，智能算法和简单易用的接口的融合，将提供我们MD的资源的放大：HealthTap 在所有三个方面都取得突破，我们很高兴能帮助他们使他们令人信服的愿景成为一个变革性的现实。

trans-unit.source: Everyone will soon become the CEO of their own health. HealthTap, with its phenomenal growth in combination with its unique technology, has the potential to become the triaging platform for everyone's health. I am excited to work with the HealthTap team as the company scales to provide people with unparalleled immediate access to the most trusted medical knowledge, doctors, and health services.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都很快就会成为自己健康的CEO。HealthTap, 凭借其独特的技术与其惊人的增长，有可能成为每个人的健康的分类就诊平台。我很高兴与HealthTap 团队一起工作，随着公司规模扩大，为人们提供无与伦比的即时可访问最可信的医学知识，医生和健康服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has the opportunity to touch everyone on the planet and to become a great enterprise—maximizing both social and economic value. It delivers value for patients, who will gain unprecedented access to doctors; value for doctors, who can treat more people more easily and cost-effectively; and value for society, which has been searching for a long time for a way to solve the healthcare dilemma of rising costs and an aging population. And given its unique and imaginative business model HealthTap is poised to become one of the most profitable businesses in the world. It’s a real game changer.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap有机会接触地球上的每个人，并成为一个伟大的企业 - 最大限度地提高社会和经济价值。它为患者提供价值，他们将获得前所未有的医生访问; 医生的价值，可以更容易地和更具成本效益地治疗更多的人; 还有社会的价值，它一直在寻找一个方法来解决成本上升和人口老龄化的长期的健康医护困境。鉴于其独特的和富有想象力的商业模式HealthTap有望成为世界上最赚钱的企业之一。这是一个真正的改变游戏规则。
Mark Leslie的莱斯利风险投资

trans-unit.source: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I'm most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust. It's this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the “consumerization” of healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap体现了强大的消费者互联网趋势，将高价值的主流离线体验（如医生与患者之间的互动）转移到在线世界。公司利用我最激动的三个关键创新驱动因素：通过智能手机和平板电脑实现新型丰富的个性化互动的移动应用程序; 增强用户参与和保留的游戏化; 和如基于专家的问与答和声誉图的社会机制，促进深厚的兴趣和信任。这种新的思维将加速消费化” 的健康医护，并重新激励这个已经由于背后的IT曲线和陷入无效率几十年的一个极其重要和有价值的行业。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is helping define the new field of “Interactive Health”—the sector that is moving consumer health information to new platforms, like smartphones and tablets, to provide portability and immediate access to actionable information. Consumers and physicians are increasingly joining the online conversation, and interactive health deserves the close attention of the investment community. HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在界定交“交互健康&rdquo的新领域——这个领域正在将消费者的健康信息移向新的平台，比如智能手机和平板电脑，来提供可携带性和即时的信息获取。消费者和医生越来越多地加入在线咨询，互动式健康值得投资界的密切关注。HealthTap展示了这一新兴空间的潜力。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's approach is brilliant. It delivers what people miss about medicine most: a highly engaging personalized experience, with trusted doctors sharing helpful information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的方法非常出色。它提供了人们最想知道的药物信息：高度专属于您的体验，与值得信赖的医生分享有帮助的信息。

trans-unit.source: Mari Baker, Investor, Board of Trustees of Stanford University
trans-unit.target: 斯坦福大学董事会投资者Mari Baker

trans-unit.source: I tend to [invest in] things that are e-commerce, like healthcare. Things that are actually more complex to do and solving a real problem in a big market where there's nobody else doing what HealthTap is doing. What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.
trans-unit.target: 我倾向于[投资于]电子商务的东西，如健康医护。事实上，在一个没有其他人做HealthTap正在做的事情的大市场上，做更复杂的事情并解决一个真正的问题。HealthTap正在做的是革命性的。

trans-unit.source: I love working at HealthTap! I’ve already worked on several exciting projects on the engineering team. This is the first internship I’ve had where I’m really making a difference. It’s been awesome to work in such a positive environment with other passionate people, while helping to save lives and make people feel good, not to mention the awesome perks like Isaac's/Gagan's chocolate shop. :)
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢在HealthTap工作！我已经在工程团队里从事几个令人兴奋的项目。这是我第一次实习，我真的有所作为。在与其他热情的人一起工作在这样一个积极的环境，同时帮助拯救生命，给人的感觉真的很好，更不用说津津乐道像Isaac’s/Gagan的巧克力店。:)

trans-unit.source: Speaking from past experience, a good internship is one where you're empowered to take initiative and be able to make a difference even as an intern in such a short time. In that sense, the internship experience at HealthTap delivered in spades. Very happy to be part of such a great team at such an important time for the company.
trans-unit.target: 从过去的经验来看，这是一个您有权利采取主动的好的实习，是一个能够在这么短的时间内作为实习生有所作为的实习。在这个意义上，坦率的交付HealthTap的实习经验很高兴在这样一个重要的时刻成为如此伟大的一个团队的一部分。
斯坦福商学院研究生院

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is great. The people are friendly and really dedicated to trying to help make the world a healthier place; the problems the team are working on are both technically interesting, and extremely important. I am honored to have had a chance to get to be a part of that environment.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是伟大的。人们是友好的，真正致力于帮助使世界成为一个更健康的地方; 团队正在开发的问题在技术上都很有趣，而且非常重要。我很荣幸能有机会成为这个环境的一部分。

trans-unit.source: B.A.S Classics and Mathematical & Computational Science
trans-unit.target: 经典和数学与计算科学

trans-unit.source: I have learned so much by interning at HealthTap, not only about engineering but also about having passion for a mission. I have gotten to work on projects that have a direct impact on the product while also being surrounded by people who are always looking towards the bigger picture. It’s been such an amazing experience and I would totally do it all over again.
trans-unit.target: 我通过在HealthTap实习不仅学习了很多，不仅是关于工程，还有对任务的热情。我已经开始工作，对产品有直接影响，同时被总是在寻找更大的前景的人们包围着。这是一个如此惊人的经验，我希望再完全的做一遍。
计算机科学学士候选人

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has been amazing so far. I took this internship looking for the "startup experience" and can honestly say I've got it plus much more. There is always something interesting to work on, which makes each day unique and exciting. It has truly been a pleasure working for HealthTap this summer.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap到目前为止是惊人的。我在这个实习期间寻找"初创公司体验" 并可以诚实地说，我学到了很多。总有一些有趣的工作，这使得每一天都不同和令人兴奋。在今年夏天，这真的是很高兴为HealthTap工作。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has been an invaluable experience. The work that the interns are given has been technically challenging and extremely important for the product, for the mission. Everyone is friendly, smart, and extremely hard working.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是一个非常宝贵的经验。实习生的工作在技术上是具有挑战性的，对于产品，对于任务来说都非常重要。每个人都是友好的，聪明的，而且非常努力地工作。

trans-unit.source: There aren’t many places that you can get an experience like you would at HealthTap. From day one you are empowered to take on projects that make a significant difference and you are expected to achieve those goals but given the support to learn and hone new skills to get there. That would be a fulfilling internship in it of itself but what separates HealthTap is the opportunity to solve challenging and important problems with an incredibly talented and passionate group of people.
trans-unit.target: 没有很多地方，您可以得到一个像您在HealthTap的经验。从第一天起，您有权力承担起有重大意义的项目，并且希望实现这些目标，但是因为支持学习和磨练新的技能来实现这一目标。这将是一个充实的实习，HealthTap是一个机会，解决具有挑战性和重要的问题，成为一个拥有令人难以置信的才华和激情的人。

trans-unit.source: It's been a pretty amazing learning opportunity to spend a summer at a company filled with talented people, who are driven by a mission to change health care. The internship experience is exactly what I was hoping for - I've really valued the time people have been willing to give me, and the opportunity to have an impact from day one. I unreservedly recommend the internship program!
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常惊人的学习机会，花一个夏天在一个充满了人才的公司，那些人都是把驱动健康医护的改变作为自己的使命。实习经验正是我所期望的 - 我真的非常珍惜人们愿意给我的时间，并从第一天起就有机会产生影响。我毫无保留地推荐实习计划！

trans-unit.source: Working at HealthTap this summer has been a great experience. I immediately jumped into a number of cool projects, which was a little overwhelming at first, but really rewarding and empowering as well. I am learning so much, and the best part has been that I've contributed to real products and projects that will help form the infrastructure of this growing company. The people here are so friendly! And, there's free chocolate.
trans-unit.target: 今年夏天在HealthTap工作是一个伟大的经验。我立即加入一些很酷的项目，虽然一开始有一些压力，但也有真正的奖励和授权。我学习了很多，最好的部分是，我已经贡献真正的产品和项目，这将有助于形成这个成长中的公司的基础设施。这里的人是如此友好！并且，还有免费的巧克力。

trans-unit.source: My time at HealthTap cannot be described as anything less than revolutionary. I have had the privilege of working with brilliant, passionate and innovative people from every field as we all strive to re-design the doctor-patient experience. From challenging projects and meaningful mentorships to balcony lunches and physics-defying chairs, HealthTap has it all. :)
trans-unit.target: 我在HealthTap的时间不能说是革命性的。我有幸与来自各个领域的杰出，热情和创新的人一起工作，我们都努力重新设计医生-患者体验。从挑战性的项目和有意义的导师，阳台午餐和物理辩论椅子，HealthTap有这一切。:)

trans-unit.source: My internship at HealthTap has not only exposed me to the fabled "startup experience", but also given me the opportunity to be part of a team that aims to change the world. The energy around the office is nothing short of infectious, and I've learned so much in the little time that I've spent here. I can honestly say that I love coming into work every single day.
trans-unit.target: 我在HealthTap的实习不仅让我看到了传说中的"初创公司体验"，而且给予我机会成为一个旨在改变世界的团队的一部分。办公室周围的能量没有传染性，我在这里度过的小时间里学到了很多。我可以诚实地说，我喜欢每天的工作。

trans-unit.source: There are so many reasons why I'm excited to walk into the HealthTap office every morning. In many internship programs, mentors play a supportive role and teach students a lot. What makes the HealthTap internship program unique, though, is that I have been given some real, important responsibilties and I am therefore able to play a role in the growth of a movement. The people here are energetic and inspiring. Every day, I'm challenged to take charge of a project and see it through to completion. It's so exciting to work at HealthTap!
trans-unit.target: 有很多的原因解释为什么我每天早上进入HealthTap办公室很兴奋。在许多实习计划中，导师扮演支持角色，并教会学生很多。但是，HealthTap实习计划的独特之处在于，我获得了一些真正重要的责任，因此我能够在运动的成长中发挥作用。这里的人是充满活力和受到激励的。每天，我都有责任承担一个项目，并完成任务。在HealthTap工作非常令人兴奋！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has a supportive community, either your boss, colleagues, or people from other groups are happy to provide help at anytime. I've learned a lot every week during my work here, I'm appreciative for the opportunity.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap有一个支持社区，您的老板，同事或其他团体的人都乐意随时提供帮助。我在这里的工作的每一周都学到了很多，我很感激这个机会。
脸书个人资料或网页链接

trans-unit.source: The excitement about HealthTap Prime, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere, has been phenomenal. Real HealthTap users and doctors were so inspired by using HealthTap Prime, they couldn’t wait to share their experiences. “As parents, using HealthTap Prime has really given us peace of mind knowing that we can contact a doctor 24/7,” shared dad Tristen OBrien on %{open_link}Good Morning America%{close_link}.
trans-unit.target: 关于HealthTap Prime已经成为了一种现象的令人兴奋的我们新的特别服务，通过视频或文本聊天，随时随地通过顶级医生连接您和您的亲人。真正的HealthTap用户和医生通过使用HealthTap Prime受到激励，他们想要迫不及待地分享他们的体验。“作为父母，使用HealthTap Prime真的让我们放心，知道我们可以全天24小时与医生联系，”爸爸Tristen OBrien对%{open_link}早安美国%{close_link}的分享。

trans-unit.source: I came across HealthTap when I was short of breath. I was suffering with lower back pain and HealthTap doctors said it could be a collapsed lung. Seeing this, naturally I was worried. I called 911 and was transported to the emergency room. I was released 2 days ago & I'm healing nicely..thanx 2 ur website...you saved my life! I thank you from the bottom of my heart :-)
trans-unit.target: 当我呼吸短促时，我碰到了HealthTap。我患有腰痛，HealthTap医生说可能是肺功能衰竭。看到这一点，我自然很担心我拨打了911，被送到急诊室。我被释放2天前和我正在愈合..thanx 2 ur网站...您挽救了我的生命！我从心底感谢您 :-)

trans-unit.source: We noticed that you included a question in your thank-you note to %{expert}. We’d be delighted to help you get an answer to your question. You can do so in two ways.

You may also continue to use our HealthTap Concierge service to get help from your doctor or specialists of your choice in Concierge Virtual Consults.

trans-unit.source: Be easy to understand: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.
trans-unit.target: 易于理解：问题必须用英语，易于理解，以及关于健康或健康话题。

trans-unit.source: Check spelling of words and medicines: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication. Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.
trans-unit.target: 检查单词和药物的拼写：不同国家/地区的药物使用不同的名称，因此请务必包含药物的通用名称。我们的专家是拥有美国执业执照的医生，很少回答关于他们不熟悉的国外独特的药物，或他们没有访问的其他国家的医院或临床操作的问题。

trans-unit.source: Unlimited consults with doctors 24/7 using a PC or any mobile device!
trans-unit.target: 使用电脑或任何移动设备24/7全天候与医生无限咨询！

trans-unit.source: Total peace of mind with a doctor always "on call" for you and your loved ones
trans-unit.target: 完全放心的为您和您的亲人经常与“随传随到”的医生

trans-unit.source: Health checklists personalized by doctors just for you or your family
trans-unit.target: 医生只为您或您的家人提供的专属于您的健康清单

trans-unit.source: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn,t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.
trans-unit.target: 询问有意义的问题：问题必须包含足够有意义的和有责任的详细信息。命名一个话题（例如，“头痛？”）而不询问具体的东西，不给医生准确地回答的足够信息。您可以考虑提到有影响的性别，持续时间，年龄范围或身体区域。

trans-unit.source: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors, names.
trans-unit.target: 保持私密：不要包括您的姓名，其他人的姓名或医生，姓名。

trans-unit.source: Great news! %{expert} answered your question and is now available to follow up with you for a live, in-depth %{open_link}video or text consultation%{close_link}. You asked:
trans-unit.target: 好消息！%{expert}回答了您的问题，在线与您进行实时的，详细的%{open_link}视频或文本的后续咨询{%{close_link}。您已询问：

trans-unit.source: Still have questions? Follow up with %{expert} today!
trans-unit.target: 仍然有问题吗？立刻后续与%{expert}！

trans-unit.source: Virtual Consults provide real time interaction with top doctors to get answers, advice, and prescriptions from the comfort of your home, on any device. Get your questions answered today!
trans-unit.target: 在线咨询提供与顶级医生的实时交互，以从舒适的家或在任何设备上获得回答，建议和处方。立刻获得您问题的回答！

trans-unit.target: 希望在HealthTap上与您的个人医生取得联系吗？%{open_link}邀请您的医生！%{close_link}

trans-unit.source: You’re in luck! You received an answer from one of our top doctors, %{expert}. Now you have the opportunity to follow up for a live, in-depth consultation with an expert doctor who specializes in the topics you’ve asked about. You asked:

trans-unit.source: Good news! %{agree_expert} , a %{specialist_name} in our Medical Expert Network, agrees with %{expert}’s answer you're following.
trans-unit.target: 好消息！我们的医学专家网络中的%{agree_expert}，%{specialist_name}同意您所关注的%{expert}的回答。

trans-unit.source: Very often, these answers are exactly what you’re looking for and will give you the peace of mind you seek. But sometimes you may desire a more in-depth reply from a specialist. In those cases, you can request a live one-on-one consult with a doctor.

trans-unit.source: What to Expect with HealthTap Prime
trans-unit.target: 使用HealthTap Prime可以期待什么

trans-unit.source: Virtual Consults are great for treating non-urgent symptoms, learning more about a condition or treatment, getting prescriptions — when your doctor is unavailable or when you want a second opinion. Virtual Consults are for primary care, and are not available for specialty care.
trans-unit.target: 在线咨询非常适合治疗非紧急症状，更多地了解病症或治疗，获得处方 — 当您的医生不可用或当您想要第二意见。为普通门诊的在线咨询，不适用于特殊医护。

trans-unit.source: You’ll receive a summary of your consult
trans-unit.target: 您将收到您的咨询总结

trans-unit.source: You’ll receive personal recommendations or a checklist
trans-unit.target: 您将收到私人推荐或清单

trans-unit.source: You’ll automatically receive personal reminders via email and mobile notification
trans-unit.target: 您将通过电子邮件和移动通知自动收到私人提醒

trans-unit.source: These reminders are personal and just for you
trans-unit.target: 这些提醒是私人的，只为您

trans-unit.source: Don’t Use Virtual Consults for Emergencies
trans-unit.target: 不要为紧急情况使用在线咨询

trans-unit.source: Don’t Use Virtual Consults for Serious Injuries, Severe Conditions, or for Mental Care
trans-unit.target: 不要对严重的伤害，严重的情况或精神医护使用在线咨询

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on subscribing to your first checklist! You'll feel good taking action to accomplish your health goal of “%{checklist}” And you'll have the convenience of getting a doctor's reminder just for you. Here’s what to expect from adding this checklist to your profile:

trans-unit.source: Stay engaged with your health by receiving checklists and reminders
trans-unit.target: 通过接收清单和提醒，使您保持健康

trans-unit.source: Get better care from our doctors

trans-unit.source: Change your settings or opt out at any time

You control the reminders you receive: you can unsubscribe from receiving reminders via email, push notification, or both. You can do this for any specific item on a checklist %{open_link}via the menu available in the top right corner of an action item%{close_link}, from an entire checklist, or from email and push notifications in general %{open_link_2}via your settings%{close_link}.

快速、可靠、简单的灾难救援

trans-unit.source: This is how I explain the simple and effective virtual appointment process to my patients on my website!
trans-unit.target: 这是我如何在我的网站解释简单有效的在线预约过程给我的患者！

trans-unit.source: Yes, and I love the fact that my HealthTap Virtual Practice works seamlessly with my existing website and blog, and I even posted a video to welcome my patients.
trans-unit.target: 是的，并且我喜欢这个事实，我的HealthTap在线诊疗无缝地与我现有的网站和博客，我甚至发布了一个欢迎我的患者的视频相结合。

trans-unit.source: It’s wonderful! My patients can check in with me virtually and explore integrative approaches to treating heart disease and cardiac risk factors.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！我的患者可以在线地查看我，并探索整合方法来治疗心脏病和心脏危险因素。

trans-unit.source: I can easily show patients how they can now see me from anywhere. But really, anywhere!
trans-unit.target: 我可以很容易地向患者展示他们如何在任何地方看到我。是真的，任何地方！

trans-unit.source: The "Ask Dr. Buck" section of my website breaks it down step-by-step and makes it super easy for my patients to connect when I'm available
trans-unit.target: "询问Buck医生" 我的网站的一部分一步步地打破了它，并使我的患者在我可用时连接超级容易

trans-unit.source: It's really useful for surgery too—the relief post-op patients get from even a brief video conversation with me is astounding, especially those who can’t visit my physical office.
trans-unit.target: 这对手术也是非常有用的—从我甚至一个简短的视频对话安慰手术后患者是令人震惊的，特别是对那些不能访问我的实际办公室的患者。

trans-unit.source: I make myself available to patients in times that are most convenient for me so they can stay healthy and reach me from anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 我在自己最方便的时候为患者服务，所以他们可以保持健康并从任何地方联系我。

trans-unit.source: My patients also love that they can connect with me from anywhere! This really is the next big thing in healthcare, and I’m thrilled to be part of it.
trans-unit.target: 我的患者也喜欢在任何地方都可以和我联系。这真的是在健康医护领域下一件大事，我很高兴参与其中。

trans-unit.source: Totally, and I love that I’m able to leverage my time efficiently to guide even more patients in a shorter period of time toward better health. And they pay for it! It's easy to get started with a free Virtual Practice today.
trans-unit.target: 完全地，我喜欢我能够有效地利用我的时间在更短的时间为更好的健康来指导更多的患者。他们为此付出！立刻很容易的开始免费的在线诊疗。

trans-unit.source: Here's how I tell patients about the future of medicine — virtual appointments through my always-on Virtual Practice (even when I'm sleeping!)
trans-unit.target: 以下是我告诉患者医学的未来—通过我永远在线的在线诊疗的在线预约（即使我在睡觉！）

trans-unit.source: Checkout how I promote my Virtual Practice on Facebook ›
trans-unit.target: 看看我如何在Facebook上宣传我的在线诊疗 ›

trans-unit.source: Yes, and what’s really great is that I get to set my own schedule, and am able to work even from my living room.
trans-unit.target: 是的，真正伟大的是，我可以设定自己的时间表，甚至能够在我的客厅工作。

trans-unit.source: I show patients how easy it is to find me—both in my real-world practice and online!
trans-unit.target: 我向患者展示了找到我是多么容易—无论是在我现实世界中的诊疗还是在线！

trans-unit.source: Answers from experts on %{topic_string}. First: Unfortunately, this is difficult to answer. Costs vary based on city, site/location, practice. Talk to your physician; at times, they may have information to help you here.
trans-unit.target: %{topic_string}专家的回答。首先：不幸的是，这很难回答。费用根据城市，地点/位置，诊疗而有所不同。解决最好的方法是打电话给您的保险代理，或者如果没有保险 - 打电话四处询问并找出您可能的最佳选择。告诉您的医师; 有时，他们在这里可能有信息来帮助您。

trans-unit.source: My patients find it easy, quick, and very valuable to schedule virtual appointments via my Virtual Practice. I'm able to help patients and do good faster in ways I never before imagined possible, and it didn't cost me a dime. You can easily set up your Virtual Practice today too.
trans-unit.target: 我的患者发现通过我的在线诊疗安排在线预约会很容易，快速和非常有价值。我能够帮助患者和我从来没有想象过的可能做得更好的方式，并且它不会花我一毛钱。您今天也可以轻松地建立您的在线诊疗。

trans-unit.source: The self-scheduling on my website makes it really easy for me and for my patients
trans-unit.target: 我的网站上的自我安排使我和我的患者安排变得很简单

trans-unit.source: I love that new patients find me on HealthTap and request virtual appointments with me. This is changing the face of medicine.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢新的患者在HealthTap上找到我并请求与我在线预约。这正在改变医学的面貌。

trans-unit.source: Patients can send me secure messages and book a virtual appointment with one tap!

trans-unit.source: It also makes a huge impact on my quality of life, since we can set our own hours and get paid for seeing patients whenever and wherever it’s convenient.
trans-unit.target: 这也对我的生活质量产生了巨大的影响，因为我们可以设置自己的时间和得到报酬，并且在我无论何时何地最方便的时间查看患者。

trans-unit.resname: Postgraduate Institute for Medicine (PIM) requires instructors, planners, managers and other individuals who are in a position to control the content of this activity to disclose any real or apparent conflict of interest (COI) they may have as related to the content of this activity. trans-unit.resname: Your DocScore, which can range from 0 to 100, is a positive reflection of the recognition you've received on HealthTap from your peers. Your DocScore is another powerful feature you can use to enhance your reputation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.source: Your DocScore, which can range from 0 to 100, is a positive reflection of the recognition you've received on HealthTap from your peers. Receiving agrees and recommendations, as well as being added to another’s network, are a few of the actions that will influence your DocScore. Your DocScore is another powerful feature you can use to enhance your reputation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您的医者评分，范围从0-100，是能够积极反应您从HealthTap上的同行处得到的认可度。收到同意或者引荐，以及被加入另一个人脉网，是一些能够影响您医者评分的操作。您的医者评分是另一个您可以提高您在HealthTap上声誉的强大特性。

trans-unit.resname: Your level is a cumulative representation of your engagement on HealthTap. It's measured by the activity points you receive for performing various actions such as answering questions, peer reviewing your colleagues' answers, inviting colleagues to join the network and referring patients to colleagues.
trans-unit.source: Your level is a cumulative representation of your engagement on HealthTap. It's measured by the activity points you receive for performing various actions such as answering questions, peer reviewing your colleagues' answers, inviting colleagues to join the network and referring patients to colleagues.
trans-unit.target: 您的等级是您在HealthTap上参与度的累积表现。它是通过您参与不容的活动而获得的活动得分来参与讨论的。活动类型有参与不容的活动，例如回答问题，检阅同事的回答，邀请同事加入人脉网，介绍患者给同事等。

trans-unit.resname: You will receive an “Agree” each time one of your answers is recognized by a colleague as representing accurate and trustworthy information. This form of peer review is vital to building trust with patients who are turning to you for the highest quality information. Providing up-to-date and succinct answers, as well as building your own network of followers who will see each of your answers are great ways to get more “Agrees."
trans-unit.source: You will receive an “Agree” each time one of your answers is recognized by a colleague as representing accurate and trustworthy information. This form of peer review is vital to building trust with patients who are turning to you for the highest quality information. Providing up-to-date and succinct answers, as well as building your own network of followers who will see each of your answers are great ways to get more “Agrees."
trans-unit.target: 当您的回答呈现精确和值得信任的信息时，您的回答会被同事认可时，您将收到一个“同意”。这种形式的同行评审对于那些正在转向您以获得最高质量信息的患者建立信任至关重要。提供最新的、简明的回答，并建立自己的人脉网，网中人可以看到您的回答，这些都是获得更多“同意”的好方法。

trans-unit.resname: Restate in your answer any pertinent facts from the member's profile, so other readers will understand the basis for your personalized answer.Reiterating relevant profile information helps ensure that your answer is not out of context and is useful for other readers who do not have access to this profile information(e.g., "Women over 40 who takes medicine X should...")Learn more ›
trans-unit.source: Restate in your answer any pertinent facts from the member's profile, so other readers will understand the basis for your personalized answer. Learn more ›

trans-unit.resname: To improve your chances at getting a great answer, please, check your spelling, grammar and punctuation.See our guidelines

trans-unit.resname: To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: 要向HealthTap提出一个很棒的问题，可以参考这些有帮助的指南。

trans-unit.resname: 1. Sweat the details... at least a little.
trans-unit.source: 1. Sweat the details... at least a little.

trans-unit.resname: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
trans-unit.source: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
trans-unit.target: 在过去3个星期里，为什么我的手肘内部一直瘙痒，从而导致干性皮疹？这可能是由什么导致的？

trans-unit.resname: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source: Why do I have a rash?

trans-unit.resname: 2. Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.
trans-unit.source: 2. Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.
trans-unit.target: 2.使（您的问题描述）尽可能长这样可以帮助到其他人。因为世界各地有成千上万的人可能会读您的问题和其相应的回答。

trans-unit.resname: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
trans-unit.source: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
trans-unit.target: 是什么导致在家里做家务后会后背疼 - 我的背部从来没有受过伤？

trans-unit.resname: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast?
trans-unit.source: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast?
trans-unit.target: 什么可能导致男人胸部下面一个四分之一大小的肿块？

trans-unit.resname: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target: 在我的手背皮肤上。这个类似橡胶凸起，果冻豆的大小的东西是什么？

trans-unit.resname: Different ages will lead to different answers:
trans-unit.source: Different ages will lead to different answers:
trans-unit.target: 不同的年龄会导致不同的回答：

trans-unit.resname: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
trans-unit.source: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
trans-unit.target: 前两天，我15岁的儿子发烧了，而且走路一瘸一拐的，好像腿受了伤一样。哪些东西可能导致这种情况？

trans-unit.resname: Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source: Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target: 为什么前两天我3岁的孩子发着烧，走路还一瘸一拐，好像腿受了一样呢？

trans-unit.resname: 5. Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.
trans-unit.source: 5. Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.
trans-unit.target: 5.只要是相关的，包括体重、身高以及计量单位。

trans-unit.resname: My son is 3 years old, weight 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
trans-unit.source: My son is 3 years old, weight 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
trans-unit.target: 我儿子三岁，重27磅，高34英寸。他的身高体重在他这个年龄正常吗？

trans-unit.resname: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target: 我儿子三岁，重27磅，高34英寸。在他这个年龄正常吗？

trans-unit.resname: 6. Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.
trans-unit.source: 6. Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.
trans-unit.target: 6.请使用药物的品牌和通用名称，尤其是当您不在美国，或者询问罕见的药物。

trans-unit.resname: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
trans-unit.source: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
trans-unit.target: 我的儿子5岁，55磅，正在发烧。他服用5ml的泰诺（对乙酰氨基酚120mg / 5ml），但还在发烧。这种体重和年龄的孩子可以服用更多剂量的泰诺吗？

trans-unit.resname: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target: 我的儿子5岁，55磅，正在发烧。已服用过泰诺但还在发烧。服用泰诺

trans-unit.resname: 7. Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for YES or NO answers.
trans-unit.source: 7. Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for YES or NO answers.
trans-unit.target: 7.尽量避免提问一些医生回答“是”或者“不是”的问题。

trans-unit.resname: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
trans-unit.source: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
trans-unit.target: 抗生素如何在年轻的学龄儿童中起作用？
抗生素对儿童起作用吗？

trans-unit.resname: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
trans-unit.source: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
trans-unit.target: 为什么有些人会抵抗疫苗，明明疫苗可以用来预防疾病？

trans-unit.resname: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target: 那些反疫苗的人是彻底地不懂还是只是拒绝接受？

trans-unit.resname: 9. The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang
trans-unit.source: 9. The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang
trans-unit.target: 9.越清楚越好运用好语法，不要说脏话和俚语。

trans-unit.resname: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
trans-unit.source: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
trans-unit.target: 我当时正在锻炼手臂，然后感到二头肌处有火烧一样的疼痛。我是肌肉撕裂了吗？

trans-unit.resname: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target: 做弯举，感觉不对劲，是胳膊受伤了吗？

trans-unit.resname: 10. Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.
trans-unit.source: 10. Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.
trans-unit.target: 10.不要假设个人的历史经历（知识）。HealthTap的医生经常不会看到您以前的问题。

trans-unit.resname: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
trans-unit.source: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
trans-unit.target: 我两岁的儿子两个月前得了耳管炎，现在还发烧了，右耳会流脓。这个很常见吗？

trans-unit.resname: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target: 这种症状已经持续两天，也一直有浓流出来吗？

trans-unit.resname: 11. To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).
trans-unit.source: 11. To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).
trans-unit.target: 11.为了保护隐私，请留下您的姓名和他人的姓名（“其他”除已公开谈论某个问题的名人的名字）。

trans-unit.resname: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
trans-unit.source: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
trans-unit.target: 我刚听到演员Michael J. Fox谈论他的帕金森病。过去3年，有新的、比较好的治疗方法面市吗？

trans-unit.resname: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target: 您好医生。我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。

trans-unit.resname: 12. Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.
trans-unit.source: 12. Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.
trans-unit.target: 12.避免使用太多的缩写，因为可能导致混淆

trans-unit.resname: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
trans-unit.source: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有来生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？

trans-unit.resname: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有正常的生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？

trans-unit.resname: 13. Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.
trans-unit.source: 13. Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 13.用英语询问。这是HealthTap医生的常用语言。

trans-unit.resname: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
trans-unit.source: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
trans-unit.target: 我上周末修剪了一些树木，我的手臂已经疼了2天。这是什么原因

trans-unit.resname: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

trans-unit.resname: Here at HealthTap, we’re all about great questions AND great answers. Take a quick minute to re-read your question before posting to keep the quality of information high for everyone in our community. And thanks! We’re glad you’re here.
trans-unit.source: Here at HealthTap, we’re all about great questions AND great answers. Take a quick minute to re-read your question before posting to keep the quality of information high for everyone in our community. And thanks! We’re glad you’re here.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上，都是很棒的问题和很好的回答。在发表之前，请再快速读一遍您的问题，以保证高质量的信息提供给社区内每个人。谢谢！我们很高兴您在这里。

trans-unit.resname: TO ASK A GREAT HEALTHTAP QUESTION, USE THESE HELPFUL GUIDELINES
trans-unit.source: TO ASK A GREAT HEALTHTAP QUESTION, USE THESE HELPFUL GUIDELINES
trans-unit.target: 要向HealthTap提出一个很棒的问题，可以参考这些有帮助的指南。

trans-unit.resname: Put some details in your question. Details help doctors understand your problem.Hide examples
trans-unit.source: Put some details in your question. Details help doctors understand your problem. Hide examples
trans-unit.target: 在您的问题中加入一些细节，详细的（信息）可以帮助医生更好的理解您的问题。隐藏范例

trans-unit.resname: Good: Why have I had an itchy, dry rash on the insides of my elbows, for the past 3 weeks?
trans-unit.source: Good: Why have I had an itchy, dry rash on the insides of my elbows, for the past 3 weeks?
trans-unit.target: 好：在过去3个星期里，为什么我的手肘内部一直瘙痒，从而导致干性皮疹？

trans-unit.resname: Bad: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source: Bad: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target: 不好：为什么我会有皮疹？

trans-unit.resname: Make your question long enough to be helpful to others, because thousands of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Questions of less than 4 words are bad questions.See examples
trans-unit.source: Make your question long enough to be helpful to others, because thousands of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Questions of less than 4 words are bad questions. See examples
trans-unit.target: 使您的问题描述尽可能长（详细）这样可以帮助到其他人。因为世界各地有成千上万的人可能会读您的问题和其相应的回答。小于4个单词的问题不是一个好问题。 查看范例

trans-unit.resname: Tell us the gender (boy/girl, man/woman) whenever gender is an important detail.See examples
trans-unit.source: Tell us the gender (boy/girl, man/woman) whenever gender is an important detail. See examples
trans-unit.target: 告诉我们性别（男孩/女孩，男人/女人）。无论何时性别都是一个很重要的细节。 查看范例

trans-unit.resname: Gender not needed: What is this rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand.
trans-unit.source: Gender not needed: What is this rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand.
trans-unit.target: 不需要性别：在我的手背皮肤上。这个类似橡胶凸起，果冻豆的大小的东西是什么？

trans-unit.resname: Use correct spelling toimprove the quality of answersyou receive. In the meantime, we found these potential misspellings in your question.

trans-unit.target: 请您使用正确的拼写提高问题的质量同时，我们在您的问题发现了这些可能的拼写错误。

trans-unit.resname: Can I use the rate at which my facial hair grows as a proxy to see how strong my level of human growth hormone is, roughly speaking?
trans-unit.source: Can I use the rate at which my facial hair grows as a proxy to see how strong my level of human growth hormone is, roughly speaking?
trans-unit.target: 简单的讲，我可以用我面部毛发生长速率作为一个评估我的人类生长激素有多强的依据吗？

trans-unit.resname: What is the best way to manage seasonal allergies?
trans-unit.source: What is the best way to manage seasonal allergies?
trans-unit.target: 管理季节性过敏最好的方法是什么？

trans-unit.resname: Share with a friend or loved one here. Increase your <%=App.user.isExpert() ? 'DocScore' : 'HealthScore'%> while you’re at it!
trans-unit.source: Share with a friend or loved one here. Increase your <%=App.user.isExpert() ? 'DocScore' : 'HealthScore'%> while you’re at it!

trans-unit.resname: If you eat a big meal before bed and you're feeling full, lay on your left side.
trans-unit.source: If you eat a big meal before bed and you're feeling full, lay on your left side.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在睡觉前吃了一顿丰盛的饭后感觉很饱，就向左边躺着休息。

trans-unit.resname: Want to eat smaller portions? Try using a bowl instead of a plate.
trans-unit.source: Want to eat smaller portions? Try using a bowl instead of a plate.

trans-unit.resname: Medical Experts Reshape the Treatment Guide for Managing Cholesterol
trans-unit.source: Medical Experts Reshape the Treatment Guide for Managing Cholesterol
trans-unit.target: 医学专家重塑管理胆固醇治疗指南

trans-unit.resname: Its widely known that cholesterol-lowering statins can benefit patients with heart disease, but a new study suggests they may actually harm some people with heart failure
trans-unit.source: Its widely known that cholesterol-lowering statins can benefit patients with heart disease, but a new study suggests they may actually harm some people with heart failure
trans-unit.target: 总所周知，降低胆固醇的他汀类药物有益于心脏疾患者者，但是最新的一项研究表明实际上他们可能导致一些人的心脏衰竭。

trans-unit.resname: F.D.A. Approves Pill to Treat Hepatitis C
trans-unit.source: F.D.A. Approves Pill to Treat Hepatitis C
trans-unit.target: F.D.A批准药物/药丸治疗丙型肝炎

trans-unit.resname: The Food and Drug Administration has approved Sovaldi, from Gilead Sciences, which will let some patients be treated for a minimum of 12 weeks, but at a cost of $1,000 per daily pill.
trans-unit.source: The Food and Drug Administration has approved Sovaldi, from Gilead Sciences, which will let some patients be treated for a minimum of 12 weeks, but at a cost of $1,000 per daily pill.
trans-unit.target: 美国食品和药物管理局已批准来自Gilead Sciences的Sovaldi，患者需至少服用12周，但是每天服用药丸需要花费1,000美元。
